data.source_sentence: 효능을 장기간 지속시킬 수 있도록 항원을 천천히 유리시키는 오일 성분의 면역 보조제에 대한 추가 연구가 요구된다.

data.source_sentence: 연안 오염의 원인으로 축산, 생활 폐수 및 화학 비료 사용 등이 주목받고 있으나 양식장 취수원인 연안 해수의 오염이 증가하는 것은 분명한 것 으로 보여진다.
data.mt_sentence: Although livestock, domestic wastewater, and use of chemical fertilizers are attracting attention as causes of coastal pollution, it is clear that the pollution of coastal seawater, the source of water intake for farms, is increasing.
data.target_sentence: Although livestock, domestic wastewater, and use of chemical fertilizers are attracting attention as causes of coastal pollution, it is clear that the pollution of coastal seawater, the source of water intake for farms, is increasing.

data.source_sentence: 양식장들은 연안 해수의 오염으로부터 환수율을 높이거나 지하 해수를 활용하는 등으로 대응하고 있으나, 생산성은 점차 떨어지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Aquaculture farms are responding to pollution of coastal seawater by increasing the return rate or using underground seawater, but productivity is gradually declining.
data.target_sentence: Aquaculture farms are responding to pollution of coastal seawater by increasing the return rate or using underground seawater, but productivity is gradually declining.

data.source_sentence: 대표적인 친환경 양식법인 순환 여과 양식시스템은 다양한 수처리 설비로 사육수를 재활용하여 연안 오염을 방지할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The circulation filtration aquaculture system, a representative eco-friendly aquaculture method, can prevent coastal pollution by recycling breeding water with various water treatment facilities.
data.target_sentence: The circulation filtration aquaculture system, a representative eco-friendly aquaculture method, can prevent coastal pollution by recycling breeding water with various water treatment facilities.

data.source_sentence: 외부 환경적요인에서는 자유롭지만 시스템 내 자가 오염에 대응하기에는 여전히 어려움이 많다.
data.mt_sentence: Although it is free from external environmental factors, there are still many difficulties in responding to self-pollution in the system.

data.source_sentence: 실험 기간 동안 사육수의 수온은 하절기의 관리 목표 환경과 비슷한 20-24°C를 유지하였다.
data.mt_sentence: During the experiment, the water temperature of the breeding water was maintained at 20-24°C, similar to the management target environment in summer.
data.target_sentence: During the experiment, the water temperature of the breeding water was maintained at 20-24°C, similar to the management target environment in summer.

data.source_sentence: 각 실험구마다 수집된 OPO 농도는 일련의 연속적인 측정값을 배열하여 각각의 측정 지점의 평균값(Sχ=∑ni=1Si/n)을 산출하는 종합적 평균법(ensemble averaging)으로 처리하여 오존의 주입 주기성을 조사하는 데에 활용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The OPO concentration collected for each experimental group was treated by ensemble averaging, which arranged a series of consecutive measurements to calculate the average value of each measurement point (Sχ=∑ni=1Si/n), and the ozone injection periodicity was used to investigate.
data.target_sentence: The OPO concentration collected for each experimental group was treated by ensemble averaging, which arranged a series of consecutive measurements to calculate the average value of each measurement point (Sχ=∑ni=1Si/n), and the ozone injection periodicity was used to investigate.

data.source_sentence: 연구에 사용된 오존 산화시스템은 OPO 농도를 일정하게 유지하는 항상성을 가지고 있고, 연구 시설인 순환 여과 양식시스템은 외부 영향에서 독립적이며 주기성을 가지고 운영할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The ozone oxidation system used in the study has homeostasis to keep the OPO concentration constant, and the circulating filtration aquaculture system, a research facility, is independent from external influences and can be operated with periodicity.
data.target_sentence: The ozone oxidation system used in the study has homeostasis to keep the OPO concentration constant, and the circulating filtration aquaculture system, a research facility, is independent from external influences and can be operated with periodicity.

data.source_sentence: 오존 산화력의 지표인 OPO 농도는 수질오염 물질들에 의존하여 변하므로 이러한 조건은 시설로의 오존의 주입 주기성을 관측할 수 있어 종합적 평균법을 이용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the OPO concentration, which is an indicator of ozone oxidizing power, varies depending on water pollutants, the general average method was used to observe the periodicity of ozone injection into the facility under these conditions.
data.target_sentence: Since the OPO concentration, which is an indicator of ozone oxidizing power, varies depending on water pollutants, the general average method was used to observe the periodicity of ozone injection into the facility under these conditions.

data.source_sentence: 오존 산화법을 활용하는 국내외 양식장들은 경험적 결과를 바탕으로 사료를 공급할 땐 오존을 주입하고 사료를 공급하지 않으면 주입하지 않는다.
data.mt_sentence: Domestic and foreign farms that use ozone oxidation methods inject ozone when supplying feed based on empirical results, and do not inject feed unless feed is supplied.
data.target_sentence: Domestic and foreign farms that use ozone oxidation methods inject ozone when supplying feed based on empirical results, and do not inject feed unless feed is supplied.

data.source_sentence: 대부분 사료가 공급되지 않았을 때 오존이 과량 공급되어 양식 생물의 집단 폐사를 일으킨 경험적 사례에 근거한 방법이다.
data.mt_sentence: Most of these methods are based on empirical cases where ozone was oversupplied when no feed was supplied, causing mass death of aquaculture organisms.
data.target_sentence: Most of these methods are based on empirical cases where ozone was oversupplied when no feed was supplied, causing mass death of aquaculture organisms.

data.source_sentence: 오존이 사료가 공급되지 않은 상황에서 사료의 공급 시기와 동일한 수준으로 지속적으로 공급한다면 생물 독성이 있는 오존 산화력이 축적되어 양식 생물에 피해를 준다는 경험적 증거이다.
data.mt_sentence: It is empirical evidence that if ozone is continuously supplied at the same level as when feed is supplied in a situation where no feed is supplied, ozone oxidizing power, which is biotoxic, will accumulate and damage aquaculture organisms.

data.source_sentence: 그럼에도 불구하고 결과에 의하면 사료와 분변 등의 유기물들과 오존이 서로 영향을 주고 있다는 것은 확실하여 오존 산화력이 집중적으로 필요한 시점이 존재한다는 반증이라 사료된다.

data.source_sentence: 일간 평균값은 대조구와 오존을 주입한 실험구들 모두 유의적 차이가 없었다.

data.source_sentence: 배양 시간에 따른 영양분 감소는 S. mutans의 세포사에 직접적인 영향을 주며 서론에서 기술한 신호전달 시스템의 발현과 밀접한 관련이 있다.

data.source_sentence: 장시간 배양은 영양분 고갈을 초래하고 이는 환경적 스트레스로 작용할 수 있으며, 이러한 환경적 신호가 세포사와 직접적으로 연관된 유전자의 발현 변화를 유도할 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 식빵의 부피는 Campbell의 종자 치환법으로 좁쌀을 이용하여 측정하였다.

data.target_sentence: The volume of bread was measured using millet by Campbell's seed replacement method.

data.source_sentence: 비용적은 식빵의 무게에 대한 식빵의 부피 비(mL/g)로 측정하여 표시하였다.

data.target_sentence: The specific volume was measured and expressed as the ratio of the volume of the bread to the weight of the bread (mL/g).

data.source_sentence: 굽기 손실율은 반죽의 무게와 식빵 무게의 차이며, 굽는 동안 손실된 무게의 비율을 측정한것으로 계산하였다.

data.source_sentence: 저장 기간 동안 미생물의 변화를 관찰하기 위해 빵 샘플을 25℃에서 최대 14일 동안 저장하고, 미생물 수를 7일 간격으로 측정하였다.

data.source_sentence: 각각의 샘플 10 g을 멸균 플라스틱 파우치에 90 mL의 식염수와 함께 첨가하였다.

data.source_sentence: 식빵 추출물은 AAA의 방법에 따라 제조되었다.

data.source_sentence: Whatman 여과지를 통해 여과한 후, 추출물을 사용하여 항산화 활성을 측정하였다.

data.target_sentence: After filtration through Whatman filter paper, the extract was used to measure antioxidant activity.

data.source_sentence: 혼합물을 마이크로센트리퓨즈에 넣고 5분 동안 격렬하게 진탕한 후, 어두운 실온에서 30분 동안 배양하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The mixture was placed in a microcentrifuge, shaken vigorously for 5 minutes, and then incubated for 30 minutes at dark room temperature.
data.target_sentence: The mixture was placed in a microcentrifuge, shaken vigorously for 5 minutes, and then incubated for 30 minutes at dark room temperature.

data.source_sentence: 혼합물을 나일론 주사기 필터 (0.45μm)로 여과하였다.

data.target_sentence: The mixture was filtered through a nylon syringe filter (0.45 μm).

data.source_sentence: 각 샘플의 항산화 활성 능력을 측정하기 위하여 ABTSradical 양이온 소거 활성을 처리된 샘플에 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: ABTSradical cation scavenging activity was used in the treated samples to measure the antioxidant activity capacity of each sample.
data.target_sentence: ABTSradical cation scavenging activity was used in the treated samples to measure the antioxidant activity capacity of each sample.

data.source_sentence: 실온에서 10분 동안 인큐베이션한 후, 734 nm의 파장에서 흡광도를 측정하였다.

data.target_sentence: After incubation at room temperature for 10 minutes, absorbance was measured at a wavelength of 734 nm.

data.source_sentence: ABTS 라디칼 소거 활성에서 Ao는 브로콜리새싹 분말이 없는 대조군의 흡광도이고, A1은 브로콜리 새싹분말이 첨가된 샘플의 흡광도이다.

data.source_sentence: 선정된 관능검사 요원들에게 실험 목적 및 평가 항목에 대하여 설명하고 훈련시킨 후 실험의 객관성을 위하여 10가지의 시료에 무작위 숫자인 3자리의 난수표를 접시에 부착하여 관능검사를 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After explaining the purpose of the experiment and the evaluation items to the selected sensory test personnel and training them, for the objectivity of the experiment, a 3-digit random number table, which is a random number, was attached to a plate for a sensory test for 10 samples.

data.source_sentence: 평가는 7점 기호 척도법을 사용하여 평가하였으며, 선호도가 낮을수록 1점, 높을수록 7점에 가까운 점수를 주도록 하고, 관능 평가의 항목은 색(color), 외관(apperance), 향(smell), 맛(taste)과 질감(texture) 및 전체적인기호도(overall acceptability)를 측정하였다.

data.source_sentence: 탄력성(springiness)은 외부의 힘에 의해 영향을 받으며, 이러한 힘에 의해 원래의 상태로 돌아가려고 하는 성질을 말한다.

data.target_sentence: Springiness refers to the property of being influenced by an external force and trying to return to its original state by this force.

data.source_sentence: 식빵의 점착성은 브로콜리새싹 분말의 첨가량이 증가할수록 증가하는 경향을 보였으며, 시료 간에 유의한 차이가 나타났다.

data.source_sentence: 브로콜리새싹 분말이 첨가된 빵의 저장 안정성을 개선시킬 수 있는지를 결정하기 위해, 총 호기성 플레이트 수(APC) 및 몰드는 14일까지 저장하는 동안 측정되었다.

data.source_sentence: 대조구 샘플은 저장하는 동안 1.5, 3.0 또는 4.5% 브로콜리새싹 분말로 강화된 것과 비교하여 APC 수가 유의하게 더 높은 것으로 관찰되었다.

data.target_sentence: In general, in all samples, the number of APCs increased as the storage time increased, but compared to the control without broccoli sprout powder, the growth rate of microorganisms in the bread containing broccoli sprout powder was slow.

data.source_sentence: 이번 연구 결과는 브로콜리새싹 분말의 첨가가 Mold 수를 현저히 감소시켰음을 보여 주었다.

data.source_sentence: FBBC 반응 시스템은 크게 5단계로 구성되었으며, 1단계로 3 m3 용량의 원수저장조와 유량균등화조, 2단계로 무산소조로 이루어져 있다.

data.source_sentence: CODMn의 경우 산화제로 과망간산칼륨을 사용하며, 이중산성 고온 과망간산칼륨에 의한 정량법은 황산은(Ag2SO4) 사용으로써 염소이온의 방해를 방지하는 방법으로 탄소화합물들은 산화하기 쉬우나 질소화합물은 산화하기 어려운 특징을 가지고 있다.

data.target_sentence: ANOVA analysis shows that cultivated crops are related to soil pH, organic matter, effective phosphoric acid, and Ca2+ content, especially pH and Ca2+ showed high significance with cultivated crops.

data.target_sentence: Overall, there was no significant correlation with the soil chemical composition, but a weak positive correlation with Mg2+.

data.source_sentence: 기온과 DHA값과의 관계는 연 평균 기온과는 약한 음의 상관 관계를 보였으며, 측정 시점의 기온과는 약한 양의 상관 관계를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: The relationship between the temperature and the DHA value showed a weak negative correlation with the annual average temperature, and a weak positive correlation with the temperature at the time of measurement.
data.target_sentence: The relationship between the temperature and the DHA value showed a weak negative correlation with the annual average temperature, and a weak positive correlation with the temperature at the time of measurement.

data.source_sentence: 미생물 군집의 다양성을 나타내는 지표인 Shannonindex는 종의 개수와 분포 정도를 고려한 지표이며, 값이 높을수록 다양한 종이 해당 군집을 이루고 있다고 판단하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Shannonindex, an indicator of the diversity of microbial communities, is an indicator that considers the number and distribution of species, and the higher the value, the more various species form the cluster.
data.target_sentence: Shannonindex, an indicator of the diversity of microbial communities, is an indicator that considers the number and distribution of species, and the higher the value, the more various species form the cluster.

data.mt_sentence: The results of the ANOVA analysis suggested that DHA values may vary depending on the cultivated crops, the growth period of the crops, the presence or absence of cultivation, and the season.
data.target_sentence: The results of the ANOVA analysis suggested that DHA values may vary depending on the cultivated crops, the growth period of the crops, the presence or absence of cultivation, and the season.

data.source_sentence: DHA값은 재배 기간 중 누적 강수량, 세균 및 곰팡이의 다양성, 재배 작물, 생육기, 재배 유무, 계절 등에 대한 영향을 종합적으로 받는 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is judged that the DHA value is comprehensively affected by the accumulated precipitation during the cultivation period, the diversity of bacteria and fungi, the cultivated crop, the growing season, the presence or absence of cultivation, and the season.

data.source_sentence: 재배 작물에 따른 토양 세균 및 곰팡이의 군집 구성에 대해 연구하였다.

data.target_sentence: The community composition of soil bacteria and fungi according to cultivated crops was studied.

data.source_sentence: 토양 내 곰팡이와 세균 군집의 다양성이 음의 상관관계를 보이고, 콩 재배 시 세균 군집의 다양성이 증가한다는 보고가 있어 본 연구의 결과와 일치하는 경향을 보였다.

data.source_sentence: 콩, 감자, 배추 세 작물의 재배에 따른 토양 세균 및 곰팡이 군집의 구성은 Fig. 2에 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: The composition of the soil bacteria and fungal community according to the cultivation of three crops, soybean, potato, and Chinese cabbage, is shown in Fig. 2 is shown.

data.source_sentence: 농경지에서 작물의 DHA 값이 세균의 다양성과 양의 상관 관계를 보여 각 재배 작물 토양에서 높은 abundance를 보인 세균 군집은 DHA 값과 관련이 있을 것으로 추측된다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the DHA value of crops in agricultural fields was positively correlated with the diversity of bacteria, it is presumed that the bacterial community with high abundance in the soil of each cultivated crop is related to the DHA value.
data.target_sentence: Since the DHA value of crops in agricultural fields was positively correlated with the diversity of bacteria, it is presumed that the bacterial community with high abundance in the soil of each cultivated crop is related to the DHA value.

data.source_sentence: 곰팡이 군집의 다양성은 DHA 값과 강한 음의 상관 관계를 보이며, 재배 작물에 따라 다른 구성을 보이고 있으므로 이와 관련해서는 추가적인 연구가 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: The diversity of the fungal community showed a strong negative correlation with the DHA value and showed a different composition depending on the cultivated crop, so additional research is needed in this regard.
data.target_sentence: The diversity of the fungal community showed a strong negative correlation with the DHA value and showed a different composition depending on the cultivated crop, so additional research is needed in this regard.

data.source_sentence: 농경지에서 토양 건전성을 나타내는 지표 중 하나로 활용되고 있는 토양 미생물 효소 활성은 토양 화학성, 재배 작물, 기후 등의 영향을 받는 것으로 알려져 있다.

data.target_sentence: In this study, by analyzing the correlation between the enzyme activity of soil microorganisms and biotic and abiotic environmental factors, the factors affecting the enzyme activity of soil microorganisms in agricultural land were comprehensively evaluated and analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 우리 나라에서는 CMV 항체 양성률이 3세에 80%, 6세에 90%, 9세 이상에서는 약95 - 98%로 매우 높으나, 신장 이식 후에는 CMV 관련 질병이 약 5-13%, 간을 이식한 후에는 14%에서 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: In Korea, the positive rate of CMV antibodies is very high, 80% at the age of 3, 90% at the age of 6, and about 95-98% at the age of 9, but after kidney transplantation, CMV-related diseases occur in about 5-13%, and 14% after liver transplantation.
data.target_sentence: In Korea, the positive rate of CMV antibodies is very high, 80% at the age of 3, 90% at the age of 6, and about 95-98% at the age of 9, but after kidney transplantation, CMV-related diseases occur in about 5-13%, and 14% after liver transplantation.

data.source_sentence: 특히 장기 이식 후나 림프성 종양과 관련된 경우 및 후천성 면역결핍 상태 등 T림프구-매개성 면역 기능이 저하되는 경우 CMV 재활성 증후군이 발현되는 경우가 많다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, CMV reactivation syndrome is often expressed after organ transplantation, in cases associated with lymphoid tumors, and when T lymphocyte-mediated immune function is reduced, such as in acquired immunodeficiency conditions.
data.target_sentence: In particular, CMV reactivation syndrome is often expressed after organ transplantation, in cases associated with lymphoid tumors, and when T lymphocyte-mediated immune function is reduced, such as in acquired immunodeficiency conditions.

data.source_sentence: CMV-특이적 T 세포 면역 모니터링은 이식 전 및 이식 후 CMV 감염, CMV 질환의 위험을 예측하여 적절한 치료 방침을 결정할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: CMV-specific T-cell immune monitoring can predict the risk of CMV infection and CMV disease before and after transplantation to determine an appropriate treatment plan.
data.target_sentence: CMV-specific T-cell immune monitoring can predict the risk of CMV infection and CMV disease before and after transplantation to determine an appropriate treatment plan.

data.source_sentence: 다양한 분석법이 있으며, IL-2, TNF-α, CD107, programmed death-1 (PD-1), CD154 외에도 인터페론-감마(IFN-γ)가 유용한 바이오 마커로 사용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Various assays exist, and interferon-gamma (IFN-γ) is used as a useful biomarker in addition to IL-2, TNF-α, CD107, programmed death-1 (PD-1), and CD154.
data.target_sentence: Various assays exist, and interferon-gamma (IFN-γ) is used as a useful biomarker in addition to IL-2, TNF-α, CD107, programmed death-1 (PD-1), and CD154.

data.source_sentence: 중재검사(index test)는 거대 세포바이러스 특이 항원 자극 인터페론-감마 효소결합 면역흡착 점적법, 거대세포바이러스 특이 항원 자극 인터페론-감마 효소결합 면역흡착 측정법으로 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The index test was performed by cytomegalovirus-specific antigen-stimulated interferon-gamma enzyme-linked immunosorbent instillation method and cytomegalovirus-specific antigen-stimulated interferon-gamma enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay method.
data.target_sentence: The index test was performed by cytomegalovirus-specific antigen-stimulated interferon-gamma enzyme-linked immunosorbent instillation method and cytomegalovirus-specific antigen-stimulated interferon-gamma enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay method.

data.source_sentence: 자료 추출은 시범적 검토를 거친 후, 임상 전문가의 의견을 반영하여 서식을 확정하였다.

data.target_sentence: After the data extraction went through a pilot review, the format was confirmed by reflecting the opinions of clinical experts.

data.source_sentence: 이식 환자별로는 신장이식 환자 13편, 고형장기이식 환자 3편, 간이식 환자 5편, 조혈모세포이식 환자 3편, 혈액투석 환자 1편으로 84%가 고형장기 이식환자였다.

data.target_sentence: By transplantation patients, 13 kidney transplant patients, 3 solid organ transplant patients, 5 liver transplant patients, 3 hematopoietic stem cell transplant patients, and 1 hemodialysis patient, 84% were solid organ transplant patients.

data.target_sentence: Race was divided into three major races, Asian, Black, and White, and all studies except for 5 Asians were white.

data.source_sentence: 동 기술의 안전성은 환자의 혈액을 채취하여 체외에서 이루어지므로 환자에게 직접적인 위해를 가하지 않아 검사 수행에 따른 안전성에는 문제가 없는 것으로 평가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The safety of this technology was evaluated as no problem in safety according to the test performance as it does not directly harm the patient as it is performed outside the body by collecting the patient's blood.

data.source_sentence: 예측 진단정확성을 확인한 연구는 12편이었고, 민감도 0.08-1.00, 특이도 0.14-1.00, 양성 예측도 0.21-1.00, 음성 예측도 0.48-1.00, 검사 정확도 0.36-0.92, AUC 0.69-0.85였다.
data.mt_sentence: There were 12 studies that confirmed the predictive diagnostic accuracy, and the sensitivity was 0.08-1.00, specificity 0.14-1.00, positive predictive value 0.21-1.00, negative predictive value 0.48-1.00, test accuracy 0.36-0.92, and AUC 0.69-0.85.
data.target_sentence: There were 12 studies that confirmed the predictive diagnostic accuracy, and the sensitivity was 0.08-1.00, specificity 0.14-1.00, positive predictive value 0.21-1.00, negative predictive value 0.48-1.00, test accuracy 0.36-0.92, and AUC 0.69-0.85.

data.source_sentence: 또한, 조혈모세포이식 환자를 대상으로 한 연구는 3편이 확인되었으나, 조혈모세포 이식 환자는 T림프구의 측정, CMV에 대한 예방적 항바이러스제 약제 사용이 필요하지 않아 동 검사의 유용성이 낮았다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, three studies targeting hematopoietic stem cell transplantation patients were confirmed, but hematopoietic stem cell transplantation patients did not require T lymphocyte measurement or use of prophylactic antiviral drugs for CMV, so the usefulness of the test was low.

data.source_sentence: 문헌 검색은 MEDLINE, EMBASE 및 Cochrane library를 포함한 전자 데이터베이스를 통해 수행되었으며, 884편이 검색되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Literature search was performed through electronic databases including MEDLINE, EMBASE and Cochrane library, and 884 articles were searched.
data.target_sentence: Literature search was performed through electronic databases including MEDLINE, EMBASE and Cochrane library, and 884 articles were searched.

data.source_sentence: 표현형 검사에서 CPE로 분류된 균주는 수기 PCR, CPO, Carba5를 사용하여 carbapenemase 생성 여부와 형별 분류를 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For strains classified as CPE in the phenotypic test, the generation of carbapenemase and classification by type were confirmed using manual PCR, CPO, and Carba5.
data.target_sentence: For strains classified as CPE in the phenotypic test, the generation of carbapenemase and classification by type were confirmed using manual PCR, CPO, and Carba5.

data.source_sentence: Carba5와 CPO의 검사 결과가 수기 PCR과 일치하지 않은 경우 수기 PCR을 재검하였고 Carba-R 검사를 추가로 시행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: If the test results of Carba5 and CPO did not match the manual PCR, the manual PCR was reexamined and the Carba-R test was additionally performed.
data.target_sentence: If the test results of Carba5 and CPO did not match the manual PCR, the manual PCR was re-examined and the Carba-R test was additionally performed.

data.source_sentence: 2019년 질병관리청의 국내 CRE 내성 경향분석 자료에 의하면 5가지 주요 형별은 주요 CPE의 99.8%를 차지하였다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's domestic CRE tolerance trend analysis data in 2019, the five major types accounted for 99.8% of the major CPEs.
data.target_sentence: According to the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's domestic CRE tolerance trend analysis data in 2019, the five major types accounted for 99.8% of the major CPEs.

data.source_sentence: 두 번째로는 Carba5가 NDM에 대해 약양성 밴드를 보이는 경우 판독 경험이 많지 않은 검사자는 위음성으로 판독할 수 있다는 보고가 있었으나, 이에 대해 제대로 평가하지는 못하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Second, when Carba5 shows a weakly positive band for NDM, it was reported that an examiner with little experience in reading could read it as a false negative, but it was not evaluated properly.
data.target_sentence: Second, when Carba5 shows a weakly positive band for NDM, it was reported that an examiner with little experience in reading could read it as a false negative, but it was not evaluated properly.

data.source_sentence: 결론적으로 Carba5는 국내 CRE 분리주의 검출과 형별 분류에 우수한 민감도와 특이도를 보였다.

data.source_sentence: 돈분 내 미생물들은 에너지를 얻기 위해 돈분 내에 있는 용존산소를 이용하여 유기물을 분해하면서 ammonia-N, VFA와 같은 악취를 유발하는 물질을 생성한다.

data.source_sentence: 농촌진흥청에서는 가축분뇨 액비를 ‘가축분뇨를 액체상태로 발효시켜 만든 비료 성분이 있는 물질’로 정의하고 있으며 농림축산식품부령으로 비료공정규격 기준을 N-P-K 성분의 총합계가 0.3% 이상 그리고 그중 질소성분의 최소함유량은 0.1% 이상으로 규정하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The Rural Development Administration defines livestock manure as "a substance with fertilizer ingredients made by fermenting livestock manure in a liquid state," and the Ministry of Agriculture, Food and Rural Affairs stipulates that the total of N-P-K ingredients is more than 0.3%, and the minimum content of nitrogen is more than 0.1%.
data.target_sentence: The Rural Development Administration defines livestock manure as 'a substance with fertilizer ingredients made by fermenting livestock manure in a liquid state', and the Ministry of Agriculture, Food and Rural Affairs stipulates that the total of N-P-K ingredients is more than 0.3%, and the minimum content of nitrogen is more than 0.1%.

data.source_sentence: 10~100 μg/mL의 농도 범위에서 LPS 유도군 대비 17.6~59.9%의 세포 생존율이 확인되었으며 비색법을 통한 세포독성 평가에서 세포 생존율이 80% 이하로 나타나면 세포독성이 나타나는 것으로 판단하기 때문에 상기 농도 범위에서는 유의적인 세포독성이 나타나는 것으로 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the concentration range of 10 to 100 μg/mL, the cell survival rate of 17.6 to 59.9% compared to the LPS-derived group was confirmed, and cytotoxicity was determined to appear if the cell survival rate was less than 80% in the colorimetric cytotoxicity evaluation.
data.target_sentence: In the concentration range of 10 to 100 μg/mL, the cell survival rate of 17.6 to 59.9% compared to the LPS-derived group was confirmed, and cytotoxicity was determined to appear if the cell survival rate was less than 80% in the colorimetric cytotoxicity evaluation.

data.source_sentence: Compound K의 RAW 264.7 세포의 염증억제 활성의 결과를 종합해 보면 0.001~1 μg/mL의 낮은 농도 범위에서 모든 바이오 마커의 생성이 억제되는 것으로 확인되었으며 이를 통해 염증 관련 기능성 소재로서의 이용가능성을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: Compound K's RAW 264.7 cell inflammatory inhibitory activity confirmed that the production of all biomarkers was inhibited in a low concentration range of 0.001 to 1 μg/mL, confirming its availability as an inflammatory-related functional material.

data.source_sentence: Escherichia coli는 인간의 장에서 흔히 발견되면서 병원 내 의료 관련 감염을 일으키는 가장 흔한 균으로 영국 및 유럽에서 혈류감염의 주요 원인이 되며 E. coli로 인한 패혈증 환자의 사망률은 9.71%로 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Escherichia coli, commonly found in the human intestine, is the most common bacteria that cause medical-related infections in hospitals, and is a major cause of bloodstream infections in the UK and Europe, and the mortality rate of sepsis patients due to E. coli is reported at 9.71%.
data.target_sentence: Escherichia coli, commonly found in the human intestine, is the most common bacteria that cause medical-related infections in hospitals, and is a major cause of bloodstream infections in the UK and Europe, and the mortality rate of sepsis patients due to E. coli is reported at 9.71%.

data.source_sentence: 대부분의 대변 내 대장균은 비병원성이나 장관독소원성대장균(enterotoxigenic E. coli), 장관침투성대장균(enteroinvasive E. coli), 장병원성대장균(enteropathogenicE. coli), shiga 독소생성대장균(shiga toxin-producing E. coli), 장관출혈성대장균(enterohemorrhagic E. coli) 또는 장관병원성대장균(enteroaggrasive E. coli)이 설사를 일으키며 출혈성 장염, 방광염, 설사질환, 용혈성 요독증후군 등의 발생원인으로 인지되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Most of the E. coli in feces are non-pathogenic, but enterotoxigenic E. coli, enteroinvasive E. coli, enteropathogenic E. coli, shiga toxin-producing E. coli ), enterohemorrhagic E. coli or enteroaggrasive E. coli cause diarrhea and were recognized as the cause of hemorrhagic enteritis, cystitis, diarrheal disease, and hemolytic uremic syndrome.
data.target_sentence: Most of the E. coli in feces are non-pathogenic, but enterotoxigenic E. coli, enteroinvasive E. coli, enteropathogenic E. coli, shiga toxin-producing E. coli, enterohemorrhagic E. coli or enteroaggrasive E. coli cause diarrhea and were recognized as the cause of hemorrhagic enteritis, cystitis, diarrheal disease, and hemolytic uremic syndrome.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 항생제 내성 균주에 대항하는 유용한 유산균을 분리 및 동정하여 probiotics 또는 post-biotics로 활용하고자 한국인의 모유에서 유산균을 분리하고 다제내성균에 우수한 항용혈 및 항균효과를 보이는 균주를 선발하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, in order to isolate and identify useful lactic acid bacteria against antibiotic-resistant strains and use them as probiotics or post-biotics, lactic acid bacteria were isolated from Korean breast milk and strains showing excellent antihemolytic and antibacterial effects on multidrug-resistant bacteria were selected.
data.target_sentence: In this study, in order to isolate and identify useful lactic acid bacteria against antibiotic-resistant strains and use them as probiotics or post-biotics, lactic acid bacteria were isolated from Korean breast milk and strains showing excellent antihemolytic and antibacterial effects on multidrug-resistant bacteria were selected.

data.source_sentence: 모유는 유축기로 열탕소독한 젖병에 50 ml 이상 착유하여 멸균 튜브에 옮겨 담았다.

data.source_sentence: 이후 TSA, LB agarplate에 획선도말하여 37℃에서 24시간 배양하여 콜로니 생성이 저해되는 최소농도를 최소저해농도(MIC), 콜로니 생성이 확인되지 않는 농도를 최소살균농도(MBC)로 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After that, it was incubated at 37°C for 24 hours by drawing a line on TSA and LBagar plate, and the minimum concentration of inhibiting colony production was set to the minimum inhibitory concentration (MIC) and the concentration of no colony production was set to the minimum sterilization concentration (MBC).

data.source_sentence: 유산균은 일반적인 식품을 제조하는 데 유통 기한을 늘리기 위한 화학적 물질을 대신하여 bacteriocin과 같은 천연 생체 활성 peptide로서 식품 부패와 병원균을 예방하고 품질 유지를 도모한다.

data.source_sentence: 실험에 사용된 저장 용기는 개발된 항균 용기(KAPP)와 기존 시판 용기인 폴리프로필렌 용기(KPP), 스테인레스 스틸 용기(KST), 포세린 용기(KPC)로 총 4가지를 사용하였다.

data.source_sentence: 김치를 저장하는 동안 총균수의 증가와 감소는 4가지 용기 모두 비슷했으나 KAPP의 경우 가장 낮은 증가를 보였고 대장균군의 경우에는 저장 15일 이후부터 50일까지 가장 낮은 수준을 유지하는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: The increase and decrease of the total number of bacteria during storage of kimchi was similar in all four containers, but the KAPP showed the lowest increase and the coliform group maintained the lowest level from 15 days to 50 days after storage.
data.target_sentence: The increase and decrease of the total number of bacteria during storage of kimchi was similar in all four containers, but the KAPP showed the lowest increase and the coliform group maintained the lowest level from 15 days to 50 days after storage.

data.source_sentence: 김치의 적숙기는 발효 정도와 관계가 있고 발효 온도와 발효 시간에 따라 관여하는 균이 달라지며 발효 양상과 김치의 맛도 담그는 방법과 발효 온도와 저장 온도에 따라 더 영향을 받는다고 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was reported that the ripening period of kimchi is related to the degree of fermentation, the bacteria involved depend on the fermentation temperature and fermentation time, and the fermentation pattern and the taste of kimchi are more affected by the fermentation temperature and storage temperature.
data.target_sentence: It was reported that the ripening period of kimchi is related to the degree of fermentation, the bacteria involved depend on the fermentation temperature and fermentation time, and the fermentation pattern and the taste of kimchi are more affected by the fermentation temperature and storage temperature.

data.source_sentence: 김치를 시지 않게 하는 용기의 밀폐성과 용기 표면이 김치와 직접 접촉하는 데 따른 위생성 등을 감안 한다면 김치 저장 용기의 기술은 온도 조절 기술만큼이나 중요하다고 할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Considering the airtightness of the container that does not sour kimchi and the hygiene of the surface of the container being in direct contact with kimchi, the technology of the kimchi storage container can be said to be as important as the temperature control technology.
data.target_sentence: Considering the airtightness of the container that does not sour kimchi and the hygiene of the surface of the container being in direct contact with kimchi, the technology of the kimchi storage container can be said to be as important as the temperature control technology.

data.source_sentence: AAA가 개발한 저장 용기에 저장된 김치의 이화학적인 변화 특성을 살펴본 결과 개발된 저장 용기에 저장된 김치는 장기간 pH와 산도, 염도가 유지되었으며 VITC의 잔존율이 시판 용기보다 높게 유지되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of examining the chemical change characteristics of kimchi stored in a storage container developed by AAA, the pH, acidity, and salinity of kimchi stored in the storage container were maintained for a long time, and the residual rate of VITC was higher than that of commercial containers.
data.target_sentence: As a result of examining the chemical change characteristics of kimchi stored in a storage container developed by AAA, the pH, acidity, and salinity of kimchi stored in the storage container were maintained for a long time, and the residual rate of VITC was higher than that of commercial containers.

data.source_sentence: 본 실험에 사용된 배추는 가을 배추로 포기당 평균 2.5 kg 정도 크기의 것이며 2017년 9월 아산시 소재 N마트에서 구입하여 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The Chinese cabbage used in this experiment is an autumn cabbage, with an average size of about 2.5 kg per bag, and was purchased from N Mart in Asan City in September 2017.
data.target_sentence: The Chinese cabbage used in this experiment is an autumn cabbage, with an average size of about 2.5 kg per bag, and was purchased from N Mart in Asan City in September 2017.

data.source_sentence: 저장 기간동안 5일 간격으로 시료를 채취 후 분석하였기 때문에 각 시료별로 250±1.5 g씩 담아 10개의 용기에 저장하였고 총 40개 통의 김치시료는 1±1℃에서 저장하면서 매 실험에 통을 1개씩 무작위로 택해서 실험에 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Since samples were collected and analyzed every 5 days during the storage period, 250±1.5 g of each sample was put in 10 containers, and a total of 40 kimchi samples were stored at 1±1℃, and one container was randomly selected for each experiment.
data.target_sentence: Since samples were collected and analyzed every 5 days during the storage period, 250±1.5 g of each sample was put in 10 containers, and a total of 40 kimchi samples were stored at 1±1℃, and one container was randomly selected for each experiment.

data.source_sentence: 김치 시료의 대장균 군수는 단계별로 희석한 용액 1 mL씩을 무균적으로 대장균/대장균군 측정용 배지 3M 밥을 함께 제공하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For the E. coli group of the kimchi sample, 1 mL of each diluted solution was aseptically provided with 3M rice as a medium for E. coli/E. coli group measurement.
data.target_sentence: For the E. coli group of the kimchi sample, 1 mL of each diluted solution was aseptically provided with 3M rice as a medium for E. coli/E. coli group measurement.

data.source_sentence: 동일한 방법으로 계수시험을 2번 반복하여 평균치를 산출하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The average value was calculated by repeating the coefficient test twice in the same method.
data.target_sentence: The average value was calculated by repeating the coefficient test twice in the same method.

data.source_sentence: 관능검사 항목은 붉은 정도, 숙성 정도와 같은 외관(Appearance), 냄새(odor; 신내, 군덕내), 맛(taste; 단맛, 신맛, 감칠맛, 탄산미, 전체적인 맛), 조직감(texture; 단단한 정도, 질긴 정도, 아삭아삭한 정도), 전반적인 기호도(overallpreference)이며 7점법(7-point scale)을 이용하여 평가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The sensory test items were red, ripening, appearance (Appearance), smell (Sinnae, Gundeoknae), taste (sweet, sour, savory, carbonic, overall taste), texture (tough, tough, crunchy), and overall preference (overallpreference), and 7 points (7-point scale) were evaluated.
data.target_sentence: The sensory test items were external aspect such as how red or fermented it is, odor (sour and stale smell), taste (sweet, sour, savory, carbonic, overall taste), texture (tough, tough, crunchy), and overall preference and they were evaluated by using 7-point scale.

data.source_sentence: 이들 젖산균도 어느 정도 자라고 나면 자체 생산된 산에 의해 사멸되는데 그렇게 되면 김치는 시어지고 효모나 곰팡이 등에 의해 변색되며 군덕내를 생성하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: When these lactic acid bacteria grow to some extent, they are killed by their own produced acids, and if so, kimchi will wither, discolored by yeast or fungi, and create a gundeoknae.
data.target_sentence: When these lactic acid bacteria grow to some extent, they are killed by their own produced acids, and if so, kimchi will wither, discolored by yeast or fungi, and create a stale smell.

data.source_sentence: 우리나라의 전통적인 김치 발효 과정 중에서 초기에 우점하는 미생물로서 Leuconostoc 속이 다수 보고된 바 있으며 이것은 젖산과 CO2를 많이 생성하여 국물을 산성으로 만들고 혐기상태로 해 줌으로써 호기성균의 생육을 억제한다.
data.mt_sentence: Among Korea's traditional kimchi fermentation processes, many Leuconostoc genus have been reported as dominant microorganisms in the early stages, which suppresses the growth of aerobic bacteria by producing a lot of lactic acid and CO2, making the soup acidic and anaerobic.
data.target_sentence: Among Korea's traditional kimchi fermentation processes, many Leuconostoc genus have been reported as dominant microorganisms in the early stages, which suppresses the growth of aerobic bacteria by producing a lot of lactic acid and CO2, making the soup acidic and anaerobic.

data.source_sentence: 저장 45일째의 같은 기간에 KAPP 용기에 저장된 김치는 Leuconostoc spp.의 수가 6.66 logCFU/mL로 유지되었는데 이는 저장 중 김치 발효 초기 미생물이 유지되는 것이므로 숙성 속도를 지연시켜 저장기간을 연장시킬 것으로 보여진다.
data.mt_sentence: During the same period on the 45th day of storage, the number of Leuconostoc spp. was maintained at 6.66 logCFU/mL in the kimchi stored in the KAPP container. This is because the microorganisms in the early stage of kimchi fermentation are maintained during storage, so it is expected to prolong the storage period by delaying the ripening rate.
data.target_sentence: During the same period on the 45th day of storage, the number of Leuconostoc spp. was maintained at 6.66 logCFU/mL in the kimchi stored in the KAPP container; this is because the microorganisms in the early stage of kimchi fermentation are maintained during storage, so it is expected to prolong the storage period by delaying the ripening rate.

data.source_sentence: 시판 용기는 발효가 진행되면서 젖산균의 생육이 활발해져 젖산균이 생성하는 각종 유기산에 의해 미생물의 증식이 억제되므로 발효 후기에 미생물의 수가 감소한다.
data.mt_sentence: Commercial containers are active in the growth of lactic acid bacteria as fermentation proceeds, and the growth of microorganisms is suppressed by various organic acids produced by lactic acid bacteria, so the number of microorganisms decreases in the late stage of fermentation.
data.target_sentence: Commercial containers are active in the growth of lactic acid bacteria as fermentation proceeds, and the growth of microorganisms is suppressed by various organic acids produced by lactic acid bacteria, so the number of microorganisms decreases in the late stage of fermentation.

data.source_sentence: 이상의 결과 자생식물의 추출물을 첨가하여 개발된 저장 용기는 시판 저장 용기와 비교했을 때 젖산발효에 효과적이며 유익하지 않은 균에 대한 항균 효과가 우수하여 김치의 저장 기간을 연장시킴으로써 김치의 저장에 활용 가능한 용기로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result, the storage container developed by adding extracts of native plants is considered to be effective for lactic acid fermentation and has excellent antibacterial effect against unprofitable bacteria compared to commercial storage containers.
data.target_sentence: As a result, the storage container developed by adding extracts of native plants is considered to be effective for lactic acid fermentation and has excellent antibacterial effect against unprofitable bacteria compared to commercial storage containers.

data.source_sentence: 해조류(seaweed)는 아시아 국가를 중심으로 일반 및 건강 식품으로 주로 소비되어 왔으나 점차 유럽 및 북미지역에서도 해조류에 대한 건강 기능적 특성이 보고되면서 세계적으로 소비량이 크게 증가하고 있는 추세이다.
data.mt_sentence: Seawed has been mainly consumed as a general and health food in Asian countries, but consumption is increasing significantly worldwide as health functional characteristics of seaweed have been reported in Europe and North America.
data.target_sentence: Seaweed has been mainly consumed as a general and health food in Asian countries, but consumption is increasing significantly worldwide as health functional characteristics of seaweed have been reported in Europe and North America.

data.source_sentence: 식품시장에서 가장 큰 소비를 차지하는 건제품의 경우 수분활성도, 저장 온도 등의 다양한 요인들의 영향을 받는데 수분활성도에 따라 비효소적 갈변반응, 지방산패, 미생물 발생 정도가 달라진다.
data.mt_sentence: Dry products, which account for the largest consumption in the food market, are affected by various factors such as moisture activity and storage temperature, and the degree of nonenzymatic browning, fatty acid failure, and microbial occurrence varies depending on moisture activity.
data.target_sentence: Dry products, which account for the largest consumption in the food market, are affected by various factors such as moisture activity and storage temperature, and the degree of nonenzymatic browning, fatty acid failure, and microbial occurrence varies depending on moisture activity.

data.source_sentence: 건조물은 유통과정 중 온도, 습도 등의 환경조건 하에서 품질이 저하되어 일정 시간이 경과하면 상품으로서의 가치를 잃을 뿐만 아니라 미생물 변패에 의한 독성의 발생으로 인간에게 위해를 가져올 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: During the distribution process, the quality deteriorates under environmental conditions such as temperature and humidity, and when a certain period of time elapses, not only does it lose its value as a product, but it can also bring harm to humans due to the occurrence of toxicity due to microbial decomposition.

data.source_sentence: 건조해조류의 경우 수분 함량이 저수분 식품으로 환경조건이 다습하거나 고온인 경우 주위로부터 흡습하게 되며 이로 인한 성분의 갈변으로 표면의 색이 나빠져 기호도가 크게 감소하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of dried seaweed, it is a low-water food that absorbs moisture from the surroundings when the environmental conditions are humid or high temperature, and the color of the surface deteriorates due to browning of the ingredients, greatly reducing the preference.

data.source_sentence: 연구에 사용된 시약 염화리튬(Lithium chloride), 초산칼륨(potassium acetate), 염화마그네슘(magnesium chlor-ide), 탄산칼륨(potassium carbonate), 질산마그네슘(magnesiumnitrate), 요오드화칼륨(potassium iodide), 황산암모늄(ammoniumsulfate), 질산칼륨(potassium nitrate)는 BBB에서 구입하여 사용하였다.

data.source_sentence: 해초분말의 색도 변화를 살펴보기 위하여 시료를 0.07×10×15 mm 크기의 투명 진공삼면접착봉투에 진공 포장한 후 백색지 위에 놓고 중심부를 조건별로 동일한 위치에서 측정하였다.

data.source_sentence: 식품이 대기 중에서 수분을 흡습함으로써 평형수분함량에 이르는 곡선을 등온흡습곡선(moisture adsorption isotherm)이라고 부르고 반대로 식품이 수분을 대기 중에 방출함으로써 평형수분함량에 이르는 경우 얻어지는 곡선을 등온탈습곡선(moisture desoption isotherm)이라 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The curve that reaches equilibrium moisture content by absorbing moisture in the atmosphere is called a moisture adsorption curve, and on the contrary, when a food reaches equilibrium moisture content by releasing moisture into the atmosphere, the curve obtained is called a moisture desorption curve.
data.target_sentence: The curve that reaches equilibrium moisture content by absorbing moisture in the atmosphere is called a moisture adsorption  isotherm, and on the contrary, when a food reaches equilibrium moisture content by releasing moisture into the atmosphere, the curve obtained is called a moisture desorption isotherm.

data.source_sentence: 제2형 영역은 수소결합에 의해 결합되어 있는 다분자층 형성 수분함량범위의 영역이며 제3형 영역은 자유로운 유리수 상태로 다분자층형성 수분함량보다 많은 모세관 응고영역이다.
data.mt_sentence: The type 2 region is a region within the range of moisture content in the formation of a multi-molecular layer bonded by hydrogen bonds, and region 3 is a region of capillary coagulation in a free free water state that is greater than the moisture content in the formation of a multi-molecular layer.
data.target_sentence: The type 2 region is a region within the range of moisture content in the formation of a multi-molecular layer bonded by hydrogen bonds, and region 3 is a region of capillary coagulation in a free free water state that is greater than the moisture content in the formation of a multi-molecular layer.

data.source_sentence: 식품 분말의 고결현상은 입자 표면에서 지속적인 흡착, 용해가 반복적으로 발생하면서 인근 분말입자들과 결합하게 되고 이러한 현상이 분말제품의 유동성을 크게 저하시키는 현상이다.
data.mt_sentence: The coagulation phenomenon of food powder is a phenomenon in which continuous adsorption and dissolution occurs repeatedly on the surface of the particles, and they combine with neighboring powder particles, and this phenomenon greatly reduces the fluidity of powdered products.
data.target_sentence: The coagulation phenomenon of food powder is a phenomenon in which continuous adsorption and dissolution occurs repeatedly on the surface of the particles, and they combine with neighboring powder particles, and this phenomenon greatly reduces the fluidity of powdered products.

data.source_sentence: 저장 4주차의 해조류 분말의 고결 정도(caking index)는 상대습도 11~53% 조건에서는 일어나지 않았으나 69, 81, 93% 조건에서는 각각 86.9%, 99.45%, 99.98%로 높은 케이킹 현상이 나타나는 것으로 나타났다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 수질 분석을 수행한 양식장은 넙치의 겨울 월동을 위해 지하 해수를 장기간 사용하지만 연안 해수에 대한 의존도가 높을수록 시설 내로 유입되는 양식 용수의 질소화합물의 농도가 상승하는 경향을 보였다.

data.source_sentence: 식물은 0-15°C의 온도에서 저온 스트레스를 받게 되고 세포막의 구조와 조성의 변화, 원형질분리 등의 세포 변화뿐만 아니라 이산화탄소, 에틸렌의 비정상적인 생성 등 대사과정도 변형된다.
data.mt_sentence: Plants are subjected to low-temperature stress at a temperature of 0-15°C, and not only cellular changes such as changes in the structure and composition of cell membranes and protoplast separation, but also metabolic processes such as abnormal production of carbon dioxide and ethylene are altered.
data.target_sentence: Plants are subjected to low-temperature stress at a temperature of 0-15°C, and not only cellular changes such as changes in the structure and composition of cell membranes and protoplast separation, but also metabolic processes such as abnormal production of carbon dioxide and ethylene are altered.

data.source_sentence: 시설재배지에서의 염류집적은 화학비료와 퇴비를 과도하게 시비하여 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: Salt accumulation in facility cultivation sites is caused by excessive application of chemical fertilizers and compost.
data.target_sentence: Soil salinity in facility cultivation sites is caused by excessive application of chemical fertilizers and compost.

data.source_sentence: PGPR은 화학농약 및 비료에 비해 효과 발현이 늦고 효과가 낮으며 지속기간이 짧아 적용범위가 제한적이라는 단점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Compared to chemical pesticides and fertilizers, PGPR has the disadvantages of slow onset of effect, low effect, and limited application range due to short duration.
data.target_sentence: Compared to chemical pesticides and fertilizers, PGPR has the disadvantages of slow onset of effect, low effect, and limited application range due to short duration.

data.source_sentence: 인축에 대한 독성이 낮고 생태계에 미치는 영향이 적은 장점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It has the advantage of low toxicity to humans and low impact on the ecosystem.
data.target_sentence: It has the advantage of low toxicity to humans and livestock and low impact on the ecosystem.

data.source_sentence: 토마토 종자(Solanumlycopersicum, 품종 주이켄)를 70% 에탄올에 1분, 3% 차아염소산나트륨에 3분간 살균한 후 살균증류수로 5회 세척하여 상토를 충진한 마젠타 박스에 파종하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Tomato seeds (Solanumlycopersicum, variety Juiken) were sterilized in 70% ethanol for 1 minute and 3% sodium hypochlorite for 3 minutes, washed 5 times with sterile distilled water, and sown in a magenta box filled with top soil.
data.target_sentence: Tomato seeds (Solanumlycopersicum, variety Juiken) were sterilized in 70% ethanol for 1 minute and 3% sodium hypochlorite for 3 minutes, washed 5 times with sterile distilled water, and sown in a magenta box filled with top soil.

data.source_sentence: 토마토의 뿌리를 취하고 털어 내어 비근권 토양을 제거한 뒤 0.85% NaCl에 담구어 15분간 진탕하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The roots of the tomatoes were taken and shaken to remove the non-rhizome soil, then immersed in 0.85% NaCl and shaken for 15 minutes.
data.target_sentence: The roots of the tomatoes were taken and shaken to remove the non-rhizome soil, then immersed in 0.85% NaCl and shaken for 15 minutes.

data.source_sentence: 토마토 생육 촉진 및 비생물적 스트레스에 대한 토마토의 내성증강 효과 검정에 대해 서술하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The purpose of this study is to describe the effect of enhancing tomato tolerance to tomato growth promotion and abiotic stress.
data.target_sentence: The purpose of this study is to describe the effect of enhancing tomato tolerance to tomato growth promotion and abiotic stress.

data.source_sentence: 1엽이 전개되기 전 R2A 배지에 액체배양한 균주를 8000 rpm에 15분간 원심분리하고 상등액을 제거하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The strain cultured in liquid in R2A medium before one leaf was developed was centrifuged at 8000 rpm for 15 minutes, and the supernatant was removed.
data.target_sentence: The strain cultured in liquid in R2A medium before one leaf was developed was centrifuged at 8000 rpm for 15 minutes, and the supernatant was removed.

data.source_sentence: 온도 스트레스에 대한 토마토의 내성 증강 검정은 생육 촉진효과 검정과 동일한 방법으로 파종 후 2주차에 시험균주를 토마토에 관주처리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the test for enhancing the resistance of tomatoes to temperature stress, the test strain was irrigated with tomatoes at 2 weeks after sowing in the same way as the test for the growth promoting effect.
data.target_sentence: In the test for enhancing the resistance of tomatoes to temperature stress, the test strain was drenched on tomatoes at 2 weeks after sowing in the same way as the test for the growth-promoting effect.

data.source_sentence: BTH는 식물의 면역력을 유도하여 병에 대한 저항성을 증가시키므로 본 실험의 양성 대조구로 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: BTH was used as a positive control in this experiment because it increases resistance to disease by inducing immunity of plants.
data.target_sentence: BTH was used as a positive control in this experiment because it increases resistance to disease by inducing immunity of plants.

data.source_sentence: 생육 온도 범위는 균주를 R2A 배지에 접종하여 5~50°C(5°C 간격)에서 1주일간 배양한 후 생육 유무를 관찰하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As for the growth temperature range, the strain was inoculated into R2A medium and cultured at 5-50 °C (5 °C interval) for 1 week, and then growth was observed.
data.target_sentence: As for the growth temperature range, the strain was inoculated into R2A medium and cultured at 5-50 °C (5 °C interval) for 1 week, and then growth was observed.

data.source_sentence: 질소고정능은AAA의 방법에 준하여 시험용 배지에 균주를 접종한 후 28°C에서 3일간 배양한 후 생육했을 경우 양성으로 판정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Nitrogen fixation was determined to be positive if it was cultured at 28°C for 3 days after inoculating a strain on a test medium according to the method of AAA.
data.target_sentence: Nitrogen fixing ability was determined as positive when the strain was inoculated in the test medium according to the method of AAA and grown at 28°C for 3 days.

data.source_sentence: 암모니아 생성능을 측정하기 위해 균주를 펩톤워터 10 ml에 접종한 후 28°C에서 4일간 배양하였다.
data.mt_sentence: To measure the ammonia-producing ability, the strain was inoculated in 10 ml of peptone water and then incubated at 28 °C for 4 days.
data.target_sentence: To measure the ammonia-producing ability, the strain was inoculated in 10 ml of peptone water and then incubated at 28 °C for 4 days.

data.source_sentence: 토마토 종자 및 근권에서 56균주를 분리하였고 생육촉진 검정을 통해 대조구에 비해 토마토의 생체중이 통계적으로 유의하게 증가한 PMC12, PMC17, PMC35 균주를 선발하였다.
data.mt_sentence: 56 strains were isolated from tomato seeds and rhizomes, and PMC12, PMC17, and PMC35 strains with statistically significantly increased tomato live weight compared to the control were selected through a growth promotion test.
data.target_sentence: 56 strains were isolated from tomato seeds and rhizomes, and PMC12, PMC17, and PMC35 strains with statistically significantly increased tomato fresh weight compared to the control were selected through a growth promotion test.

data.source_sentence: 녹말, 카제인, 섬유소, 지질, 인산 등의 가수분해 실험에서 PMC12 균주는 활성이 없었고 PMC17 균주와 PMC35 균주는 카세인과 지질 가수분해능이 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the hydrolysis test of starch, casein, fiber, lipid, phosphoric acid, etc., the PMC12 strain had no activity, and the PMC17 strain and PMC35 strain had casein and lipid hydrolysis ability.
data.target_sentence: In the hydrolysis test of starch, casein, fiber, lipid, phosphoric acid, etc., the PMC12 strain had no activity, and the PMC17 strain and PMC35 strain had casein and lipid hydrolysis ability.

data.source_sentence: 식물생육촉진 관련 특성을 분석한 결과 세 균주 모두 IAA 생성능과 ACC 탈아민효소 생성능, 질소고정 및 암모니아 생성능, 시토키닌 생성능과 시드로포아 생성능이 있는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of analyzing the plant growth promotion-related characteristics, all three strains were found to have IAA-producing ability, ACC deaminase-producing ability, nitrogen fixation and ammonia-producing ability, cytokinin-producing ability, and cydropore-producing ability.
data.target_sentence: As a result of analyzing the plant growth promotion-related characteristics, all three strains were found to have IAA-producing ability, ACC deaminase-producing ability, nitrogen fixation and ammonia-producing ability, cytokinin-producing ability, and siderophore -producing ability.

data.source_sentence: 염처리 2주 후 지상부 생체중을 측정한 결과 세균현탁액을 관주처리한 실험구에서 모두 대조구에 비해 생체중이 유의성 있게 높았다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of measuring the fresh weight of the above-ground part after 2 weeks of salt treatment, all of the experimental groups irrigated with the bacterial suspension had a significantly higher live weight than the control group.
data.target_sentence: As a result of measuring the fresh weight of the above-ground part after 2 weeks of salt treatment, all of the experimental groups drenched with the bacterial suspension had a significantly higher fresh weight than the control groups.

data.source_sentence: PMC 균주를 처리하면 염 스트레스 조건에서 식물체의 생육이 대조구에 비해 증가됨을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was confirmed that when the PMC strain was treated, the growth of the plant was increased compared to the control under salt stress conditions.
data.target_sentence: It was confirmed that when the PMC strain was treated, the growth of the plant was increased compared to the control under salt stress conditions.

data.source_sentence: 온도 스트레스에 대한 토마토의 내성 증강 유무를 확인하기위해 10°C, 25°C, 40°C의 배양기에 4일간 온도 스트레스를 처리한 결과는 Fig. 5과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The results of 4 days of temperature stress treatment in an incubator at 10°C, 25°C, and 40°C in order to confirm whether or not the resistance of tomatoes to temperature stress is enhanced is shown in Fig. Same as 5.
data.target_sentence: The results of 4 days of temperature stress treatment in an incubator at 10°C, 25°C, and 40°C in order to confirm whether or not the resistance of tomatoes to temperature stress is enhanced as shown in Fig. 5.

data.source_sentence: PMC17 처리구는 7.5 g, PMC35 처리구는 7.4 g으로 대조구에 비해 생체중이 증가되었지만 통계적으로 유의하지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: The PMC17 treatment group was 7.5 g, and the PMC35 treatment group was 7.4 g, and the live weight was increased compared to the control group, but it was not statistically significant.
data.target_sentence: The PMC17 treatment group was 7.5 g, and the PMC35 treatment group was 7.4 g; the fresh weight was increased compared to the control group, but it was not statistically significant.

data.source_sentence: 40°C의 고온 스트레스를 받은 토마토는 PMC 균주를 관주처리를 하여도 스트레스의 내성이 증진되지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: Tomatoes subjected to high temperature stress of 40 °C did not improve the tolerance of stress even when the PMC strain was irrigated.
data.target_sentence: Tomatoes subjected to high-temperature stress of 40 °C did not improve the tolerance of stress even when the PMC strain was drenched.

data.source_sentence: PMC 균주는 저온과 중온 조건에서 대조구에 비해 생육이 증가되었지만 고온 조건에서는 토마토의 생육이 증가하지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: In the PMC strain, growth was increased compared to the control in low and medium temperature conditions, but tomato growth was not increased in high temperature conditions.
data.target_sentence: In the PMC strain, growth was increased compared to the control in low and medium temperature conditions, but tomato growth was not increased in high-temperature conditions.

data.source_sentence: 건조 스트레스에 대한 토마토의 내성 증강 유무를 확인하기 위해 15일간 건조 스트레스를 가한 결과는 Fig. 6과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 6 shows the results of applying dry stress for 15 days to check whether tomatoes have increased resistance to dry stress.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 6 shows the results of applying dry stress for 15 days to check whether tomatoes have increased resistance to dry stress.

data.source_sentence: PMC 균주를 처리하였을 때 건조 스트레스에 대한 내성이 증대됨을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was confirmed that the resistance to drying stress was increased when the PMC strain was treated.
data.target_sentence: It was confirmed that the resistance to drying stress was increased when the PMC strain was treated.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 식물의 생육 촉진뿐만 아니라 다양한 생물 및 비생물 스트레스 내성을 증가시키는 기능을 가진 균주를 발굴하기 위하여 토마토 근권으로부터 균주를 분리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, strains were isolated from the tomato rhizome to discover strains that not only promote plant growth but also increase resistance to various biotic and abiotic stresses.
data.target_sentence: In this study, strains were isolated from the tomato rhizome to discover strains that not only promote plant growth but also increase resistance to various biological and non-biological stresses.

data.source_sentence: 분리한 균주를 토마토에 관주처리한 결과 PMC12, PMC17, PMC35 균주처리구에서 토마토 생육이 증대되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of irrigating the isolated strain on tomatoes, tomato growth was increased in the PMC12, PMC17, and PMC35 strain-treated groups.
data.target_sentence: As a result of drenching the isolated strain on tomatoes, tomato growth was increased in the PMC12, PMC17, and PMC35 strain-treated groups.

data.source_sentence: 스트레스 조건 하에서 식물 검정한 결과 PMC12 균주가 전체적으로 우수했다.
data.mt_sentence: Plant tests under stress conditions showed that PMC12 strains were generally excellent.
data.target_sentence: Plant tests under stress conditions showed that PMC12 strains were generally excellent.

data.source_sentence: Variovorax 속은 난분해성 유기 화합물이나 중금속으로 오염된 환경에서 풍부할 뿐만 아니라 식물과 친밀도가 높아 근권 및 내생세균으로도 존재한다.
data.mt_sentence: Variovorax is not only abundant in an environment polluted with recalcitrant organic compounds or heavy metals, but also exists as rhizosphere and endogenous bacteria due to its high affinity with plants.
data.target_sentence: Variovorax is not only abundant in an environment polluted with recalcitrant organic compounds or heavy metals, but also exists as rhizosphere and endogenous bacteria due to its high affinity with plants.

data.source_sentence: 선발한 균주를 관주처리 하였을 때 토마토의 생체중이 증가한 것은 균주가 생성한 암모니움 이온을 토마토가 질소원으로 사용했기 때문인 것으로 추정된다.
data.mt_sentence: The increase in tomato's live weight when the selected strain was irrigated is presumed to be because the tomato used the ammonium ion produced by the strain as a nitrogen source.
data.target_sentence: The increase in the tomato's fresh weight when the selected strain was drenched is presumed to be because the tomato used the ammonium ion produced by the strain as a nitrogen source.

data.source_sentence: 인은 질소, 칼륨과 더불어 비료의 3대 요소로 식물이 다량으로 필요로 하지만 대부분 이용하기 어려운 불용성으로 토양에 존재한다.
data.mt_sentence: Phosphorus, along with nitrogen and potassium, is one of the three major elements of fertilizer that plants need in large quantities, but most of them are insoluble and exist in the soil.
data.target_sentence: Phosphorus, along with nitrogen and potassium, is one of the three major elements of fertilizer that plants need in large quantities, but most of them are insoluble and exist in the soil.

data.source_sentence: 인산 가용화균은 유기산 등 킬레이트 물질을 분비하여 난용성 인산염을 분해하나 토양에는 일반적으로 근권에 존재하는 다른 미생물과 경쟁하기에는 밀도가 충분하지 못한 경우가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Phosphoric acid solubilizers secrete chelating substances such as organic acids to decompose poorly soluble phosphates, but in soil, there are cases in which the density is not sufficient to compete with other microorganisms generally present in the rhizosphere.
data.target_sentence: Phosphoric acid solubilizers secrete chelating substances such as organic acids to decompose poorly soluble phosphates, but in soil, there are cases in which the density is not sufficient to compete with other microorganisms generally present in the rhizosphere.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 질소고정능, 암모니아 생성능, 인산가용화능을 가지고 있는 PMC 균주 처리 토마토는 비료의 흡수가 비교적 용이했기 때문에 대조구에 비해 생육이 증가된 것으로 추정된다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, it is estimated that the PMC strain-treated tomatoes, which have nitrogen fixing ability, ammonia production ability, and phosphoric acid solubilization ability, showed increased growth compared to the control group because the absorption of fertilizer was relatively easy.
data.target_sentence: In this study, it is estimated that the PMC strain-treated tomatoes, which have nitrogen-fixing ability, ammonia production ability, and phosphoric acid solubilization ability, showed increased growth compared to the control group because the absorption of fertilizer was relatively easy.

data.source_sentence: 염, 저온, 건조 등의 환경내성을 증가시킨 이유는 크게 두 가지로 볼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: There are two main reasons for increasing environmental resistance such as salt, low temperature, and drying.
data.target_sentence: There are two main reasons for increasing environmental resistance such as salt, low temperature, and drying.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 PMC 균주의 관주처리로 생육이 촉진되어 대조구보다 여러 스트레스에 비교적 내성을 지니게 되었을 것이라는 것과 PMC 균주가 생성한 식물호르몬으로 인하여 환경 스트레스가 감소되었을 것으로 추측된다.
data.mt_sentence: First, it is presumed that the irrigation treatment of the PMC strain promotes growth, which makes it relatively resistant to various stresses than the control, and that the environmental stress is reduced due to the plant hormone produced by the PMC strain.
data.target_sentence: First, it is presumed that the drenching treatment of the PMC strain promotes growth, which makes it relatively resistant to various stresses than the control, and that the environmental stress is reduced due to the plant hormone produced by the PMC strain.

data.source_sentence: 식물은 체내에서 생육에 필요한 여러 가지 호르몬을 합성하고 미생물에게서 공급되는 여러 호르몬에 대해서도 생리적인 영향을 받는다.
data.mt_sentence: Plants synthesize various hormones necessary for growth in the body and are also physiologically affected by various hormones supplied from microorganisms.
data.target_sentence: Plants synthesize various hormones necessary for growth in the body and are also physiologically affected by various hormones supplied from microorganisms.

data.source_sentence: 식물의 생육 및 뿌리생육을 유도하는 IAA는 유카(YUCCA) 단백질에 의해 합성 및 조절되는데 식물체에서 발현량이 증가되면 환경적 스트레스 내성을 유도하는 것으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: IAA, which induces plant growth and root growth, is synthesized and regulated by the YUCCA protein, which is known to induce environmental stress resistance when the amount of expression in plants increases.
data.target_sentence: IAA, which induces plant growth and root growth, is synthesized and regulated by the YUCCA protein, which is known to induce environmental stress resistance when the amount of expression in plants increases.

data.source_sentence: 스트레스 조건에서 에틸렌은 식물의 줄기 및 뿌리 생육을 감소시키는 것으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Under stress conditions, ethylene is known to decrease stem and root growth of plants.
data.target_sentence: Under stress conditions, ethylene is known to decrease stem and root growth of plants.

data.source_sentence: 일부 PGPR은 에틸렌의 전구체인 ACC를 분해하는 효소인 ACC 탈아민효소를 생성하여 식물체 내 에틸렌 농도를 감소시켜 환경 스트레스에 대한 저항력을 높여 준다.
data.mt_sentence: Some PGPR produces ACC deaminase, an enzyme that breaks down ACC, a precursor of ethylene, which reduces the concentration of ethylene in plants, thereby increasing resistance to environmental stress.
data.target_sentence: Some PGPR produces ACC deaminase, an enzyme that decomposes ACC, a precursor of ethylene, which reduces the concentration of ethylene in plants, thereby increasing resistance to environmental stress.

data.source_sentence: PGPR을 관주처리하면 토양 미생물 군집이 변하거나 근권 등에 우점하여 병원균의 침입을 억제할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When PGPR is administered, soil microbial communities can change or dominate the root region, thereby suppressing the invasion of pathogens.
data.target_sentence: When PGPR is drenched, soil microbial communities can change or dominate the rhizosphere, thereby suppressing the invasion of pathogens.

data.source_sentence: 염류농도는 관수처리하면 염류의 용탈에 의해 뚜렷이 감소하였으며 인삼 세근 분말을 혼화처리하면 다시 유의적으로 증가하였다.

data.source_sentence: 더욱이 전통적으로 식물에서 생산되던 아주 다양한 범주의 화합물질이나 프로바이오틱스, 당류 등이 GM 미생물에 의해 생산되고 가공되어 사용되고 있다.

data.target_sentence: Moreover, a wide variety of chemical substances, probiotics, and sugars that have been traditionally produced in plants are produced, processed, and used by GM microorganisms.

data.source_sentence: GMO에 대한 논쟁의 두 상반된 견해는 다음과 같다.

data.source_sentence: 첫 번째 재조합 DNA 기술로 인한 GM 작물 및 미생물의 활용은 농작물 생산성 향상과 의약품 등의 생물학적 대량 생산을 위한 강력한 도구라는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The utilization of GM crops and microorganisms due to the first recombinant DNA technology is a powerful tool for improving crop productivity and producing large-scale biological products such as pharmaceuticals.
data.target_sentence: The utilization of GM crops and microorganisms due to the first recombinant DNA technology is a powerful tool for improving crop productivity and producing mass biological products such as pharmaceuticals.

data.source_sentence: 살충제 감소, 화석 연료절약, CO2 배출 감소 등으로 농업으로 인한 환경 영향을 줄일수 있을 것으로 여겨졌고 그래서 지속 가능한 농업 발전을 위해 필수적인 것으로 생각되었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was thought that the environmental impact of agriculture could be reduced by reducing pesticides, saving fossil fuels, and reducing CO2 emissions, so it was considered essential for sustainable agricultural development.
data.target_sentence: It was thought that the environmental impact of agriculture could be reduced by reducing pesticides, saving fossil fuels, and reducing CO2 emissions, so it was considered essential for sustainable agricultural development.

data.source_sentence: 더욱이 개발도상국들이 당면해 있는 글로벌 식량 및 영양 부족 문제와 관련해 GM 작물은 피할수 없는 것으로 지지를 받아 오기도 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Moreover, GM crops have been supported as inevitable in relation to the global food and nutrition shortage facing developing countries.
data.target_sentence: Moreover, GM crops have been supported as inevitable in relation to the global food and nutrition shortage facing developing countries.

data.source_sentence: 미래의 GM 작물은 영양분이 증가된 산물을 생산하거나 의약적으로 중요한 분자들을 생산하고 또는 질병, 혹한, 가뭄 등에 저항성을 갖도록 개발되어 저개발국가들의 식량 안보를 향상시키는 데 적합할 수 있을 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Future GM crops could be developed to produce increased nutritional products, produce medically important molecules, or be resistant to diseases, severe cold, and drought, making them suitable for improving food security in underdeveloped countries.
data.target_sentence: Future GM crops could be developed to produce increased nutrient-enhanced products, produce medically important molecules, or be resistant to diseases, severe cold, and drought, making them suitable for improving food security in underdeveloped countries.

data.source_sentence: GMO에 대한 다른 측면의 견해로서는 환경과 인간 건강에 대한 잠재적인 부정적인 영향이 여전히 대부분 미지의 상태로 남아 있고 앞으로 수십 년 동안에도 그 영향을 알기 어렵다는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The other side of the view on GMOs is that the potential negative effects on the environment and human health remain largely unknown and are difficult to know for decades to come.
data.target_sentence: The other side of the view on GMOs is that the potential negative effects on the environment and human health remain largely unknown and are difficult to know for decades to come.

data.source_sentence: GM 작물이 수확된 후에도 여전히 그 유전자는 잔존하고 야생형의 생물에게 전이될 수 있어 생태계에 영향을 미칠 수 있을 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Even after the GM crop is harvested, the gene still remains and can be passed on to wild-type organisms, possibly affecting ecosystems.
data.target_sentence: Even after the GM crop is harvested, the gene still remains and can be passed on to wild-type organisms, possibly affecting ecosystems.

data.source_sentence: 해충이나 질병, 제초제에 저항성을 부여하는 유전자들은 GMO의 생존과 확산의 향상을 초래할 수 있을 것이고 그 유전자의 전이 잠재성은 더욱 커질 수 있을 것이다.

data.target_sentence: Genes that give resistance to pests, diseases, and herbicides may lead to improved survival and spread of GMOs, and the transmissibility of the genes could be greater.

data.source_sentence: 그러한 식물에 주입 또는 전이된 외래 유전자의 인간 건강에 대한 영향은 예측되지 못하거나 부정적일 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The effects of foreign genes injected or metastasized into such plants on human health may be unpredictable or negative.
data.target_sentence: The effects of foreign genes injected or metastasized into such plants on human health may be unpredictable or negative.

data.source_sentence: 위와 같이 GM 미생물을 포함한 GMO의 잠재력에도 불구하고 그 산물의 생태계 및 환경, 인체 안전성에 대한 우려가 크고 장기적인 안전성 검증이 부족한 실정이다.
data.mt_sentence: As described above, despite the potential of GMOs, including GM microorganisms, concerns about the ecosystem, environment, and human safety of the products are high and long-term safety verification is insufficient.
data.target_sentence: As described above, despite the potential of GMOs, including GM microorganisms, concerns about the ecosystem, environment, and human safety of the products are high, and long-term safety verification is insufficient.

data.source_sentence: 인슐린의 대량생산과 같이 GM 미생물은 많은 산업적 적용이 있어 왔다.

data.source_sentence: 토양과 지하수에 오염되어 있는 유기용제 등의 난분해성 유기오염물질 분해 및 정화에, 그러한 성분을 분해할 수 있는 GM 미생물을 개발 및 주입함으로써 복원하고자 하는 많은 연구가 진행되기도 하였다.

data.target_sentence: The purpose of this study was to investigate the potential environmental impact by analyzing whether there is a difference in metabolites between the LM microorganism and its parent microorganism (wild type).

data.source_sentence: 세균 현탁액은 1 cm 깊이로 토양을 파고 피펫을 이용해 넓이 방향으로 9.5 cm에 걸쳐 고루 주입한 후 토양을 다시 덮어 실험실 상온에 배양하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Bacterial suspension was digged into the soil to a depth of 1 cm, and then evenly injected over 9.5 cm in the width direction using a pipette, and then the soil was covered again and incubated at room temperature in the laboratory.
data.target_sentence: The bacterial suspension was dug into the soil to a depth of 1 cm, and then evenly injected over 9.5 cm in the width direction using a pipette, and then the soil was covered again and incubated at room temperature in the laboratory.

data.source_sentence: 사용된 토양은 현지 협조하에 채소 재배 시설 농지토양을 채취하여 사용하였고 실험 시 멸균 증류수를 수시로 3처리군에 같은 양(100 mL)을 살포하여 미생물의 잠재적 이동이 용이하도록 하였다.

data.source_sentence: 수분의 증발을 억제하기 위하여 실험군을 비닐(랩)로 밀폐하였다.

data.source_sentence: 21일 후 최초 wt, LMO 접종위치에서 토양 시료를 채취하여 DNA 추출까지 냉동 보관하였다.

data.target_sentence: After 21 days, soil samples were collected at the initial wt and LMO inoculation locations and stored frozen until DNA extraction.

data.source_sentence: wt 미생물 시료는 W, LM 미생물 시료는 G로 시료를 구분하였다.

data.source_sentence: wt과 LMO 대사체를 추출해 NMR로 분석한 결과 두 균주로부터의 대사체 프로파일은 거의 일치하였고 강도(amplification)에서 차이가 나타났다.

data.source_sentence: 그 이유는 분석된 세포의 초기 양에 차이가 있었던 것으로 판단되었다.

data.mt_sentence: Even if the microorganisms survived, the flow and diffusion of microorganisms may be the result of an unsatisfactory result in a given soil environment.

data.source_sentence: 이는 재조합 유전자가 토양에서 생존가능한 미생물의 염색체(chromosome)에 들어간 경우 토양 내에서 그 유전자를 직접 확인하는 것이 가능할 것으로 사료된다.

data.source_sentence: 미생물(세균)의 종의 수를 나타내는 풍부도(richness)를 Chao1 지수로 확인한 결과 시료 간 큰 차이를 보이지 않는 것을 알 수 있었다.

data.source_sentence: 생물학적 평가방법 중 invivo법은 동물을 직접 사용하여 소화율을 평가함에 따라 가장 정확한 방법으로 인정되고 있으나 실험수행에 있어 높은 비용과 노동력을 요한다는 단점이 있다.

data.source_sentence: Invitro 소화 실험에서 평가되는 시험사료는 serumbottle 내에 담겨 소화액과 직접 접촉하여 배양되며 일정 배양 시간이 지난 후 filter paper에 걸러진 시험 사료의 잔량과의 차를 통해 소화율이 측정된다.
data.mt_sentence: The test feed evaluated in the Invitro digestion experiment is placed in a serumbottle and cultured in direct contact with the digestive fluid, and the digestion rate is measured through the difference between the remaining test feed filtered in the filter paper after a certain incubation time.
data.target_sentence: The test feed evaluated in the in vitro digestion experiment is placed in a serum bottle and cultured in direct contact with the digestive fluid, and the digestibility is measured through the difference with the remaining amount of the test feed filtered on the filter paper after a certain incubation time.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 사용될 시험 사료를 제조하기 위하여 각 원료는 건물(dry matter, DM) 기준 쌀 70%, 대두박 7%, 티모시 23%의 비율로 혼합되었다.

data.mt_sentence: As the dry aging period increased, all 4 treatment groups significantly increased the pH of the supplemented meat to the level of 5.34~5.62, and there was no significant difference in the pH in the 4 treatment groups as in the case of the crucible for each dry aging period.
data.target_sentence: The pH of the m.gluteus medius also increased significantly in all 4 treatment groups, from 5.34 to 5.62 level as the dry aging period increased, and there was no significant difference in the pH of the m.gluteus medius for each dry aging period in the 4 treatment groups as in the case of m.quadriceps femoris.

data.source_sentence: 도가니육의 수분활성도는 건조숙성기간이 증가함에 따라 처리구 1과 3의 경우에 유의적인 차이가 없었지만 처리구 2와 4는 60일까지 유의적인 차이가 없다가 90일째부터 유의적으로 감소되는 경향을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: There was no significant difference in the water activity of crucible meat in the case of treatment groups 1 and 3 as the dry aging period increased, but there was no significant difference in the treatment groups 2 and 4 until the 60th day, and there was a tendency to decrease significantly from the 90th day. .
data.target_sentence: There was no significant difference in the moisture activity of m.quadriceps femoris in the case of treatment groups 1 and 3 as the dry aging period increased, but treatment groups 2 and 4 showed no significant difference until day 60, but showed a significant decrease from day 90.

data.source_sentence: 한편 보섭육의 수분활성도는 건조숙성기간이 증가함에 따라 처리구 1과 3은 유의적인 차이가 없었던 반면에 처리구 2와 4는 유의적으로 감소되는 경향을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, as the dry aging period increased, there was no significant difference in the water activity of bosoup meat in treatment groups 1 and 3, whereas treatment groups 2 and 4 showed a tendency to decrease significantly.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, as the dry aging period increased, there was no significant difference in the water activity of m.gluteus medius in treatment groups 1 and 3, whereas treatment groups 2 and 4 showed a tendency to decrease significantly.

data.source_sentence: 도가니육과 보섭육의 지방산패도(TBARS)는 건조숙성기간이 증가함에 따라 4 처리구 모두에서 유의적으로 증가하는 경향을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Fatty acidity (TBARS) of crucible and bosoup showed a tendency to increase significantly in all 4 treatment groups as the dry aging period increased.
data.target_sentence: Thiobarbituric acid reactive substances (TBARS) of m.gluteus medius and m.quadriceps femoris showed a tendency to increase significantly in all 4 treatment groups as the dry aging period increased.

data.source_sentence: 동일한 숙성일 내 처리구간 비교에서 도가니육은 건숙성 60일에 처리구 4는 다른 처리구들보다 VBN 값이 유의적으로 높았다.
data.mt_sentence: In the comparison between treatment groups within the same ripening day, the VBN value of crucible meat was significantly higher than that of other treatments at 60 days of dry aging.
data.target_sentence: In the comparison between treatment groups within the same aging day, the VBN value of m.quadriceps femoris was significantly higher than that of other treatments in treatment group 4 at 60 days of dry aging.

data.source_sentence: 보섭육도 건숙성 40일에 처리구 4가 다른 처리구들보다 VBN 값이 유의적으로 높았으며 건숙성 90일에는 처리구 2가 처리구 4 보다 유의적으로 낮았다.
data.mt_sentence: Also, at 40 days of dry aging, treatment group 4 had a significantly higher VBN value than other treatments, and at 90 days of dry aging, treatment group 2 had a significantly lower VBN than treatment group 4.
data.target_sentence: Also, for m.gluteus medius with 40 days of dry aging, treatment group 4 had a significantly higher VBN value than other treatments, and at 90 days of dry aging, treatment group 2 had a significantly lower VBN than treatment group 4.

data.source_sentence: 우육은 저장기간이 증가할수록 식육의 지방산패도가 증가하였으며 진공포장하여 숙성하는 것보다 공기 중에 노출하여 건조숙성하였을 때 지질산패도가 더 높았다고 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was reported that the fatty acidity of meat increased as the storage period increased, and the lipid acidity was higher when exposed to air and dried and aged than when aged by vacuum packaging.
data.target_sentence: It was reported that, in the case of beef, the thiobarbituric acid reactive substances of meat increased as the storage period increased, and the thiobarbituric acid reactive substances were higher when dry-aged by exposing in the air than by vacuum-packing.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 부위에 따라 지방산화도 및 단백질변패도 수치가 다른 것은 건조 숙성실에서 대분할형태인 설도육으로 현수되었고 이때 보섭과 도가니육이 근육 위치에 따라 상대적으로 공기에 노출된 표면적이 달랐기 때문인 것으로 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the different levels of fatty acid oxidation and protein deterioration depending on the part were suspended in the dry maturation room in a large-divided form of seoldo meat, and at this time, the surface area exposed to the air of the bosop and crucible meat was different depending on the muscle location. I think.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 건조숙성 조건에 따른 한우 설도육의 건조수율, pH, 수분활성도, 미생물 성장 및 산화도에 미치는 영향을 비교하고자 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study was conducted to compare the effects of Korean beef tongue meat on dry yield, pH, moisture activity, microbial growth, and oxidation according to dry aging conditions.
data.target_sentence: This study was conducted to compare the effects of Korean beef's bottom round on dry yield, pH, moisture activity, microbial growth, and oxidation according to dry aging conditions.

data.source_sentence: 설도육의 건조수율은 T3 40일과 T4 20일에서 다른 처리구들보다 유의적으로 높았으나 60일 이후에는 처리구간에 유의적인 차이가 없었다.
data.mt_sentence: The dry yield of offal meat was significantly higher than that of other treatment groups at 40 days of T3 and 20 days of T4, but there was no significant difference between the treatment groups after 60 days.
