data.source_sentence: Ice cream에서의 crystallization 억제는 자유수의 표면으로의 방출을 감소시켜 제품의 품질을 오랜 기간 유지할 수 있게 도와주며 소비자가 섭취할 때 얼음이 서걱거리는 느낌을 줄여 부드러운 질감을 제공한다.
data.mt_sentence: Inhibition of crystallization in Icecream reduces the release of free water to the surface, helping to maintain product quality for a long time, and provides a soft texture by reducing the feeling of ice crunch when consumed by consumers.
data.target_sentence: Inhibition of crystallization in Ice cream reduces the release of free water to the surface, helping to maintain product quality for a long time, and provides a soft texture by reducing the feeling of ice crunch when consumed by consumers.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 상업용 랩에 트레할로오스를 첨가하여 증식 및 외부 스트레스에 대한 저항성을 확인하였는데 트레할로오스 첨가농도에 따른 랩의 증식효과는 유의적 차이가 나타나지 않았으나 외부 스트레스에 대한 LAB의 생존률이 유의적으로 증가하였다고 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA added trehalose to commercial LAB to confirm resistance to proliferation and external stress. Although there was no significant difference in the proliferation effect of LAB according to the concentration of trehalose added, it was reported that the survival rate of LAB against external stress was significantly increased. .
data.target_sentence: AAA added trehalose to commercial LAB to confirm resistance to proliferation and external stress; although there was no significant difference in the proliferation effect of LAB according to the concentration of trehalose added, it was reported that the survival rate of LAB against external stress was significantly increased.

data.source_sentence: 연작장해를 회피하기 위해 초작지를 찾아 원거리 이동재배를 하는데 이로 인해 임차료, 교통비, 제반 관리비용 등 경영비 증가의 원인이 되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to avoid damage to continuous cropping, long-distance mobile cultivation is carried out in search of cropland, which causes an increase in management costs such as rental fees, transportation costs, and other management costs.
data.target_sentence: In order to avoid injury by continuous cropping, long-distance shifting cultivation is carried out in search of the first planted field, which causes an increase in management costs such as rental fees, transportation costs, and other management costs.

data.source_sentence: 관수 후 인삼 세근 분말의 토양혼화 처리는 이병토양에 1개월 동안 관수처리 후 6년근 인삼의 세근 분말을 20포트당 g씩 토양에 골고루 혼합해 준 다음 1 개월간 보관하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After irrigation, the soil mixing treatment of ginseng root powder was performed in this soil for 1 month, and then the ginseng root powder of 6 years old was evenly mixed with the soil for 20 ports, and then stored for 1 month.
data.target_sentence: For the soil mixing treatment of ginseng root powder after irrigation, after watering in the diseased soil for 1 month, the fine root powder of 6-year-old ginseng was evenly mixed in the soil at a rate of g per 20 pots, and then stored for 1 month.

data.source_sentence: 관수 후 세근 분말처리를 한 이유는 토양의 염류농도를 재배 적정범위로 낮추어 주고 연작장해 발생에 영향을 미칠 수 있은 물질들을 줄여 인삼 세근 분말의 효과만을 명확히 구명하기 위함이었다.
data.mt_sentence: The reason for the fine root powder treatment after irrigation was to lower the salinity concentration of the soil to an appropriate range for cultivation and to reduce substances that could affect the occurrence of continuous crop failure to clearly investigate the effect of fine root powder of ginseng.
data.target_sentence: The reason for the fine root powder treatment after irrigation was to lower the salinity concentration of the soil to an appropriate range for cultivation and to reduce substances that could affect the occurrence of injury by continuous cropping to clearly investigate the effect of fine root powder of ginseng.

data.source_sentence: 토양시료는 묘삼을 정식하기 전인 2016년 4월 상순에 채취하여 2㎜ 체로 정선한 다음 미생물 다양성 분석에 이용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Soil samples were collected in early April 2016 before planting seedlings, selected through a 2mm sieve, and used for microbial diversity analysis.
data.target_sentence: Soil samples were collected in early April 2016 before planting ginseng seedlings, selected through a 2mm sieve, and used for microbial diversity analysis.

data.source_sentence: 묘삼 정식 및 인삼 생육특성을 조사하기 위해 4월 상순에 자경종 묘삼 (0.77±0.04g/주)을 각각 처리된 포트에 포트당 20주씩 정식하여 재배하였으며 적정 토양수분(18-20%)을 유지해 주기 위해 1주일 간격으로 포트당 1 ℓ의 지하수를 관주해 주었다.
data.mt_sentence: To investigate the planting of ginseng seedlings and the growth characteristics of ginseng, in early April, seedlings of vigilante seedlings (0.77±0.04g/week) were planted and cultivated for 20 weeks per pot in each treated pot, and proper soil moisture (18-20%) was maintained. 1 ℓ of groundwater per pot was irrigated at intervals of 1 week for water supply.
data.target_sentence: To investigate the planting of ginseng seedlings and the growth characteristics of ginseng, in early April, Panax ginseng seedlings (0.77±0.04g/week) were planted and cultivated for 20 weeks per pot in each treated pot, and to maintain proper soil moisture (18-20%), 1 liter of groundwater per pot was drenched at weekly intervals.

data.source_sentence: 6월 하순에 초장, 엽장, 엽폭 등 지상부 생육특성을 조사하였으며 7월 상순에 수확하여 주당근중, 근장 등 지하부 생육특성과 뿌리썩음병 발생률을 조사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The above-ground growth characteristics such as plant height, leaf length, and leaf width were investigated in late June. After harvesting in early July, the underground growth characteristics such as root weight and root length and the incidence of root rot disease were investigated.
data.target_sentence: The above-ground growth characteristics such as plant height, leaf length, and leaf width were investigated in late June, and after harvesting in early July, the underground growth characteristics such as root weight and root length per week and the incidence of pythium root rot were investigated.

data.source_sentence: 인삼 세근 분말 혼화처리에 의해 질산태 질소>염류농도>칼륨>인산 순으로 증가하였으며 유기물, 칼슘, 마그네슘, 나트륨 함량은 유의적인 변화를 보이지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: By the mixing treatment of ginseng fine powder, nitrogen nitrate > salt concentration > potassium > phosphate increased, and the organic material, calcium, magnesium, and sodium content showed no significant change.
data.target_sentence: By the mixing treatment of ginseng fine root powder, it increased in the order of nitrogen nitrate > salt concentration > potassium > phosphate, and the organic material, calcium, magnesium, and sodium content showed no significant change.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같이 T. crassum은 연작지 토양에 관수처리하면 크게 감소했다가 인삼 세근 분말이 첨가되면 다시 증가되었으며 H.haematococca는 연작지 토양에 관수처리하면 크게 증가되었다가 인삼 세근 분말이 첨가되면 다시 감소되는 특징을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: As such, T. crassum decreased significantly when irrigation was performed on the soft soil, and then increased again when ginseng root powder was added, and H.haematocca increased significantly when irrigation was performed on the soft soil and decreased again when ginseng root powder was added.
data.target_sentence: As such, T.crassum decreased significantly when irrigation was performed on the continuous cropping soil, and then increased again when fine ginseng root powder was added, and H.haematocca increased significantly when irrigation was performed on the continuous cropping soil and decreased again when fine ginseng root powder was added.

data.source_sentence: AAA에 의하면 인삼 사포닌과 즙액의 농도가 증가될수록 세균성 뿌리썩음병원균인 Erwinia carotovora의 생장이 촉진되었다고 하며 이것으로 미루어 볼 때 인삼 세근 잔사물은 연작장해 발생과 관련된 세균들의 생장에 영향을 미친 것으로 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: According to AAA, the growth of Erwinia carotovora, a bacterial root rot pathogen, was promoted as the concentration of ginseng saponin and juice increased, and from this, ginseng root residue seems to have affected the growth of bacteria related to serial failure.
data.target_sentence: According to AAA, the growth of Erwinia carotovora, a bacterial Pythium root rot, was promoted as the concentration of ginseng saponin and juice increased, and from this, residues of fine roots of ginseng appear to have affected the growth of bacteria related to the occurrence of injury by continuous cropping.

data.source_sentence: 초장, 경장, 엽폭, 엽장, 경직경 및 지상부중은 관수처리에 의한 뚜렷한 증가를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Plant length, long length, leaf width, leaf length, light diameter and above-ground weight were significantly increased by irrigation treatment.
data.target_sentence: Plant length, long length, leaf width, leaf length, stem diameter, and above-ground weight were significantly increased by irrigation treatment.

data.source_sentence: 관수처리 후 인삼 세근 분말 혼화처리는 경장을 제외한 초장, 엽폭, 엽장, 경직경 및 지상부중에 유의적인 변화가 없었으나 다소 증가되었다.
data.mt_sentence: After irrigation treatment, ginseng fine root powder admixture treatment did not show significant changes in plant length, leaf width, leaf length, stem diameter, and aboveground part except for light length, but slightly increased.
data.target_sentence: After irrigation treatment, ginseng fine root powder admixture treatment did not show significant changes in plant length, leaf width, leaf length, stem diameter, and aboveground weight except for stem length, but slightly increased.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같이 연작지에서의 관수처리는 인삼의 지상부 생육을 촉진하는 효과가 있었는데 이는 염류 농도 및 나트륨 농도가 크게 감소되어 삼투압 작용 등에 영향을 미쳤기 때문으로 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: As described above, the irrigation treatment in continuous cropland had the effect of promoting the growth of the above-ground part of ginseng, which seems to be because the salt concentration and sodium concentration were greatly reduced, which affected the osmotic pressure.
data.target_sentence: As described above, the irrigation treatment in continuous cropping soil had the effect of promoting the growth of the above-ground part of ginseng, which seems to be because the salt concentration and sodium concentration were greatly reduced, which affected the osmotic pressure.

data.source_sentence: AAA에 의하면 인삼의 재배에 적당한 염류 농도는 0.5-1.0 dS/m이며 염류가 과다할 경우 생리장해가 발생한다고 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: According to AAA, the salt concentration suitable for cultivation of ginseng is 0.5-1.0 dS/m, and it has been reported that excessive salt causes physiological disturbance.
data.target_sentence: According to AAA, the salt concentration suitable for the cultivation of ginseng is 0.5-1.0 dS/m, and it has been reported that excessive salt causes physiological disorders.

data.source_sentence: 관수 후 인삼 세근 분말 혼화처리에 의해 인삼의 지상부 생육이 억제되지 않아 인삼 수확 후 세근 잔사물이 인삼 지상부 생육에 영향을 미치지 않을 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the growth of ginseng on the ground is not suppressed by the mixing treatment of ginseng powder after irrigation, it is judged that the residue of ginseng after ginseng harvesting will not affect the growth of ginseng on the ground.
data.target_sentence: Since the growth of the above-ground part of ginseng is not suppressed by the mixing treatment of fine root powder after irrigation, It is judged that the fine root residues after harvesting ginseng will not affect the growth of the above-ground part of ginseng.

data.source_sentence: 인삼 세근 분말 혼화처리로 인삼 뿌리썩음병 발생이 증가되었던 것은 AAA의 보고처럼 인삼뿌리에서 분비되거나 뿌리 분해 시 발생하는 페놀화합물이 뿌리썩음병원균의 병원성을 증가시켜 뿌리썩음병 발생이 증가되었기 때문으로 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: The increase in the occurrence of ginseng root rot by the admixture of fine root ginseng powder is thought to be because, as reported by AAA, phenolic compounds secreted from ginseng roots or generated during root decomposition increased the pathogenicity of root rot pathogens, thereby increasing the incidence of root rot.
data.target_sentence: The increase in the occurrence of ginseng Pythium root rot by the admixture of fine root ginseng powder is thought to be because, as reported by AAA, phenolic compounds secreted from ginseng roots or generated during root decomposition increased the pathogenicity of Pythium root rot pathogens, thereby increasing the incidence of Pythium root rot.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에 사용된 된장의 배합비는 표 1에 나타내었으며 제조한 된장은 고밀도 폴리에틸렌 (high density polyethylene) 재질의 통에 빛이 통하지 않는 암실에서 상온에 보관하여 발효하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The mixing ratio of the soybean paste used in this study is shown in Table 1, and the prepared soybean paste was stored at room temperature in a darkroom made of high density polyethylene (HDPE) material and fermented.
data.target_sentence: The mixing ratio of the soybean paste used in this study is shown in Table 1, and the prepared soybean paste was fermented by storing it in high-density polyethylene (HDPE) container at room temperature in a dark room where light does not pass through.

data.source_sentence: 된장에 첨가된 FSP의 일일 섭취 허용량은 1.5 g이며 식품의약품안전처에서 고시한 식품 등의 표시기준에 의하면 된장의 1회 제공 기준량은 10 g으로 일일 섭취 허용량에 큰 영향은 없는 것으로 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The daily intake allowance of FSP added to soybean paste is 1.5 g, and according to the food labeling standards announced by the Ministry of Food and Drug Safety, the standard amount provided per time of soybean paste is 10 g, which is not significantly affected by the daily intake allowance.
data.target_sentence: The daily intake allowance of FSP added to soybean paste is 1.5 g, and according to the food labeling standards for food, etc. announced by the Ministry of Food and Drug Safety, the standard amount provided per time of soybean paste is 10 g, which does not significantly affect the daily intake allowance.

data.source_sentence: 전통식품 표준규격(NAPQMS, 2016)에 의하면 된장의 수분함량이 60.0% 이하이고 아미노 질소 함량이 300.0 mg/100 g 이상인 것을 볼 때 본 연구에서 제조한 된장의 수분 함량은 다소 높은 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the traditional food standard (NAPQMS, 2016), the moisture content of the soybean paste prepared in this study is judged to be rather high, given that the moisture content of the soybean paste is 60.0% or less and the amino nitrogen content is 300.0 mg/100 g or more.
data.target_sentence: According to the National Agricultural Products Quality Management Service (NAPQMS, 2016), the moisture content of the soybean paste prepared in this study is judged to be rather high, given that the moisture content of the soybean paste is 60.0% or less and the amino nitrogen content is 300.0 mg/100 g or more.

data.source_sentence: 된장에서 아미노 질소는 정미성분으로 숙성 기간이 길어짐에 따라 지속적으로 증가하므로 된장의 숙성도 평가 척도로 사용되며 기호성 역시 관계가 있다고 보고되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Amino nitrogen in doenjang is a rice-polishing ingredient and it is reported that it is used as a measure of the maturity of doenjang because it continuously increases as the aging period increases, and palatability is also related.
data.target_sentence: As amino nitrogen in soybean paste is a taste compound, and as it continues to increase as the aging period increases, it is used as a measure to evaluate the ripening of soybean paste, and it is reported that there is a relationship between palatability as well.

data.source_sentence: 숙성 8주부터 DPPHradical 소거 활성이 큰 폭으로 상승하였으나 FSP 무첨가 된장과 0.25 및 0.5%의 첨가 된장의 차이가 미미한 것으로 나타났으며 1%와 3% 첨가 된장은 유의적으로 높은 차이를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Although the DPPHradical scavenging activity increased significantly from 8 weeks of aging, the difference between the non-FSP and 0.25 and 0.5% doenjang was insignificant, and the 1% and 3% doenjang showed a significantly higher difference.
data.target_sentence: Although the DPPHradical scavenging activity increased significantly from 8 weeks of aging, the difference between the non-FSP and 0.25 and 0.5% soybean paste was insignificant, and the 1% and 3% soybean paste showed a significantly higher difference.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 다시마 추출물의 첨가량에 따라 DPPH radical 소거 활성이 유의적으로 높아져 항산화 능력이 높은 것으로 보고했으며 이는 본 연구 결과와 역시 유사한 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA reported that DPPH radical scavenging activity was significantly increased depending on the amount of kelp extract added and thus had high antioxidant capacity, which was also similar to the results of this study.
data.target_sentence: AAA reported that DPPH radical scavenging activity was significantly increased depending on the amount of sea tangle extract added and thus had high antioxidant capacity, which was also similar to the results of this study.

data.source_sentence: FSP 첨가 된장의 ABTS radical 소거 활성 측정 결과 분석에 의하면 유리아미노산의 항산화 활성이 가장 우수하였으며 관능적으로 가장 높은 점수를 받은 FSP 3% 첨가 된장과 무첨가 된장을 시료로 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the analysis of the ABTS radical scavenging activity of FSP-added doenjang, the antioxidant activity of free amino acids was the best, and the highest sensory score, 3% FSP-added doenjang and no-added doenjang, were analyzed.

data.source_sentence: AAA에 의하면 숙성 기간이 경과함에 따라 제조 된장의 유리아미노산 함량이 점차적으로 증가한다고 보고하고 있어 본 연구 결과와 유사한 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: According to AAA, it was reported that the free amino acid content of soybean paste gradually increased as the aging period elapsed, which was similar to the results of this study.

data.source_sentence: 관능 평가 결과를 살펴보면 색의 경우 FSP 0.5 및 1.0% 첨가 된장이 3.45점으로 가장 높게 나타났으며 3% 첨가 된장은 FSP의 영향으로 기호도에 영향을 미치는 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: Looking at the results of the sensory evaluation, in the case of color, FSP 0.5 and 1.0% added soybean paste were the highest with 3.45 points, and 3% added soybean paste was judged to affect the preference due to the influence of FSP.

data.source_sentence: 지황의 효능 효과에 관한 연구가 많이 이루어지고 있으나 지황은 쓴맛이 강하여 다양한 식품 소재로 활용되지 못하고 있는 실정이다.

data.target_sentence: Although many studies have been conducted on the efficacy and effect of Rehmannia glutinosa, Rehmannia glutinosa has a strong bitter taste, so it is not used as a variety of food ingredients.

data.source_sentence: 본 실험에 사용된 균주는 국립농업과학원 발효가공식품과에서 분리한 Rhizopus delemar 58-8(KACC 46422)을 사용하였으며 생지황(Rehmannia glutinosa Licoxshitz ex Steudel)은 경북 군위산 2년근으로 경동시장에서 구입하여 농촌진흥청 원예특작과학원 약용작물과에서 확인 후 사용하였다.

data.target_sentence: The strain used in this experiment was Rhizopus delemar 58-8 (KACC 46422) separated from the Fermentated Processing Food Science Division of the National Agricultural Research Institute, and the Rhmannia glutinosa Licoxhitz ex Steudel is a two-year-old root from Gunwisan, Gyeongsangbuk-do, purchased at Gyeongdong Market, and used after checking in the Herbal Medicine Department of National Institute of Horticultural and Herbal Science of the Rural Development Administration.

data.source_sentence: 발효 기간이 증가함에 따라 발효 지황의 수분 함량이 거의 변화가 없는 것으로 나타났다.

data.source_sentence: 5점 척도법을 사용하여 1점 아주 나쁨, 2점 나쁨, 3점 보통, 4점 좋음 및 5점 아주 좋음으로 색, 향, 짠맛, 구수한 맛, 단맛, 신맛, 쓴맛 및 전체 기호도에 대한 관능 평가를 실시하였다.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 전통 메주로 숙성된 간장이 L값이 높으며 전통식 메주보다 개량식 메주를 사용하여 제조한 간장이 a값과 b값이 높아 메주의 종류와 숙성 기간이 색도에 영향을 미친다고 보고하였다.

data.source_sentence: 전체적 기호도는 2.65-3.45점의 범위로 나타났으며 WST 3% 첨가 조미간장이 2.65로 가장 낮은 것으로 조사되었고 FSP 3% 첨가 조미간장이 3.45로 가장 높게 조사되었다.

data.target_sentence: Crassostrea gigas that are used as samples were collected from five oyster farms in Yongnam-Gwang-Do, Gyeongsangnam-do, once a month from January 2014 to December 2015.

data.source_sentence: 육상오염원 시료는 용남광도 해역 주변 육상에서 바다로 유입되는 주요 오염원 11개소를 대상으로 하였으며 2014년 1월부터 2015년 12월까지 분기별 1회씩 총 8회에 걸쳐 88개소를 조사하였다.

data.source_sentence: 육상오염원 지점별로 오염의 발원지와 주변환경에 대한 보다 정밀한 추적조사가 수행되어야 할 것으로 판단되며 용남광도 해역의 굴에서 분리된 E. coli 56 균주에 대한 항생제 내성 패턴은 Table 4에 나타내었다.

data.source_sentence: 액젓은 젓갈을 여과하거나 분리한 액 또는 이에 여과 분리하고 남은 것을 재발효 또는 숙성시킨 후 여과하거나 분리한 액을 혼합한 것을 말한다.

data.source_sentence: 일본의 경우 2009년 오메시 매실(D 계통)에서 처음 알려졌으며 진딧물과 감염 접수로 확산된 것을 확인하였고 2010년 우메 매화공원으로 확산되어 100주 이상 제거, 2009-2012년까지 약 2,600주를 제거하였지만 박멸되지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: In Japan, it was first known in 2009 from Omesh plum (D lineage), and it was confirmed that it spread to aphids and infections, and in 2010, it was removed from Ume plum park for more than 100 weeks, and about 2,600 shares were removed by 2009-2012 but it was not eradicated.
data.target_sentence: In case of Japan, it was first known in 2009 from Omesh plum (D strain), and it was confirmed that it spread by receiving aphids and infections, and in 2010, it spread to Ume Plum Blossom Park and more than 100 strains were removed, and about 2,600 strains were removed until 2009-2012, but it was not eradicated.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 국내 복숭아, 매실 등 핵과류 과원의 자두곰보바이러스 감염 여부를 조사하고 이를 바탕으로 발생 주 제거 등 국내 금지급 자두곰보병의 예방 및 방제 대책 수립을 위한 기초자료로 활용하고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study investigated whether nuclear fruit orchards such as peaches and plums in Korea were infected with Plum gombo virus, and based on this, it was intended to be used as basic data for the establishment of preventive and control measures for domestic prohibited Prunus Prunus disease such as removal of the outbreak.
data.target_sentence: This study investigated whether stone fruit orchards such as peaches and plums in Korea were infected with the Plum pox virus, and based on this, it was intended to be used as basic data for the establishment of preventive and control measures for domestic prohibited Plum pox virus such as removal of the outbreak strains.

data.source_sentence: 2016년 6월 경북 청도군 복숭아 과원에서의 금지병원체 의심시료 발견에 따라 청도군 지역의 복숭아 4과원(이서면 2과원, 화양읍 2과원)의 전수 나무에 대해 자두곰보병 발생 여부를 조사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In June 2016, according to the discovery of a sample suspected of a prohibited pathogen in a peach orchard in Cheongdo-gun, Gyeongsangbuk-do, we investigated whether or not Prunus bear infant disease occurred in the whole tree of 4 peach orchards (Iseo-myeon 2, Hwayang-eup 2) in the Cheongdo-gun area.
data.target_sentence: In June 2016, according to the discovery of a sample suspected of a prohibited pathogen in peach orchards in Cheongdo-gun, Gyeongsangbuk-do, the occurrence of Plum pox virus was investigated on the whole tree of 4 peach orchards (2 orchard in Iseo-myeon, 2 orchards in Hwayang-eup) in Cheongdo-gun.

data.source_sentence: 전국의 핵과류 과원 조사의 경우 8개도, 1개 특별자치시, 3개 광역시의 핵과류 과원의 시료 채집은 과원당 자두곰보병 의심증상을 보이는 포장에서 양끝 열, 중간 열 총 3열이 조사되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of a nationwide nuclear fruit orchard survey, samples were collected from nuclear fruit orchards in eight provinces, one special autonomous city, and three metropolitan cities, and a total of three columns were investigated in each orchard showing symptoms of Plum bear disease.
data.target_sentence: In the case of a nationwide stone fruit orchard survey, samples were collected from stone fruit orchards in eight provinces, one special autonomous city, and three metropolitan cities, and a total of three rows at both ends and middle row were investigated in the packaging showing suspected symptoms of Plum pox virus per orchard.

data.source_sentence: 이상 증상 등을 고려하여 열당 5주의 나무를 선정하고 각 나무의 서로 다른 2개의 가지에서 각 1잎씩을 채집하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Five trees per row were selected in consideration of abnormal symptoms, and one leaf was collected from two different branches of each tree.
data.target_sentence: Five trees per row were selected in consideration of abnormal symptoms, and one leaf was collected from two different branches of each tree.

data.source_sentence: 1차 묶음 시료에 대한 자두곰보바이러스 유전자 검정 결과 양성인 경우 나무별 개별 검정을 위하여 자두곰보병 의심 나무의 사방 가지에서 2잎 이상씩 총 8잎 이상을 채집하였다.
data.mt_sentence: If the result of the P. gombovirus gene test for the first batch sample was positive, a total of 8 or more leaves were collected from every branch of a tree suspected of having P. gombo disease for individual testing.
data.target_sentence: If the result of the Plum pox virus gene test for the first batch sample was positive, more than 2 leaves were collected from rhombic branches of the tree suspected of having Plum pox virus for individual testing for each tree, more than 8 leaves in total.

data.source_sentence: 2차 나무 개별에 대한 자두곰보병 검정 결과 양성인 경우 자두곰보바이러스 감염 나무 주변 사방 8주의 나무에서 2차 개별 시료 채집과 동일한 방법으로 추가 시료를 채집하였다.

data.source_sentence: 이처럼 폴리페놀, 플라보노이드 등과 같은 자소엽 착즙액의 항산화 물질들이 아질산을 일산화질소로 전변시켜 염지 육색의 발현을 촉진했기 때문에 PTP의 적색도가 높게 나타났다고 이야기할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As such, it can be said that the redness of PTP was high because antioxidant substances in perilla extract such as polyphenols and flavonoids promoted the expression of salted meat by converting nitrite to nitric oxide.
data.target_sentence: As such, it can be said that the redness of PTP was high because antioxidant substances in perilla frutescens extract such as polyphenols and flavonoids promoted the expression of cured meat by converting nitrite to nitric oxide.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 PTP의 명도가 낮게 나타나고 황색도가 높게 나타난 것은 자소엽 고유의 색으로 인해 소시지의 색이 영향을 받은 것으로 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: The low brightness and high yellowness of PTP in this study are thought to be influenced by the color of the sausage due to the intrinsic color of the perilla leaf.
data.target_sentence: The low brightness and high yellowness of PTP in this study are thought to be influenced by the color of the sausage due to the intrinsic color of the perilla frutescens.

data.source_sentence: 플라즈마를 처리한 자소엽 에탄올 추출물을 육가공품에 첨가할 경우 추출물의 아질산 함량을 조절하여 첨가량을 줄이고 자소엽 고유의 색이 제품의 관능적 품질에 부정적인 영향을 미치지 않도록 추가적인 연구가 필요할 것으로 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: When plasma-treated perilla leaf ethanol extract is added to processed meat products, it is thought that additional research is needed to control the amount of nitrous acid in the extract to reduce the amount of perilla leaf and to prevent the intrinsic color of perilla leaf from negatively affecting the organoleptic quality of the product.
data.target_sentence: When plasma-treated perilla frutescens ethanol extract is added to processed meat products, it is thought that additional research is needed to reduce the amount added by controlling the nitrite content of the extract and to ensure that the color of perilla frutescens does not negatively affect the sensual quality of the product.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구를 위해 자소엽 추출물에 대기압 플라즈마를 처리하여 7.5 g kg-1의 아질산이온이 함유된 자소엽 추출물 분말을 제조하였으며 아질산염(Control), 셀러리 분말(Celery) 및 자소엽 추출물 분말(PTP)를 이용하여 아질산이온이 70 mg kg-1 첨가된 소시지를 제조하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For this study, perilla leaf extract was treated with atmospheric pressure plasma to prepare perilla leaf extract powder containing nitrite ions of 7.5 g kg-1, and nitrite (Control), celery powder (Celery) and perilla leaf extract powder (PTP) were prepared A sausage was prepared in which 70 mg kg-1 of nitrite ions were added.
data.target_sentence: For this study, perilla leaf frutescens was treated with atmospheric pressure plasma to prepare perilla frutescens extract powder containing nitrite ions of 7.5 g kg-1, and sausages to which 70 mg kg-1 of nitrite ions were added were prepared using nitrite (Control), celery powder (Celery) and perilla frutescens extract powder (PTP).

data.source_sentence: 소시지의 잔존 아질산이온 함량 측정 결과 PTP에서 저장 21일 동안 잔존 아질산이온 함량이 가장 낮았으며 Control 및 Celery와 비교하여 PTP에서 저장 중 총 호기성 미생물 수가 높은 것으로 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of measuring the residual nitrite ion content of sausage, it was confirmed that the residual nitrite ion content was the lowest in PTP for 21 days of storage, and the total number of aerobic microorganisms during storage was high in PTP compared to Control and Celery.
data.target_sentence: As a result of measuring the residual nitrite ion content of sausage, it was confirmed that the residual nitrite ion content was the lowest in PTP for 21 days of storage, and the total number of aerobic microorganisms during storage was high in PTP compared to Control and Celery.

data.source_sentence: 이로 인해 소시지의 관능평가에서 PTP가 Control 및 Celery와 비교하여 낮은 육색 선호도를 보였으며 풍미 또한 가장 낮은 점수를 받았다.
data.mt_sentence: For this reason, in the sensory evaluation of sausages, PTP showed a lower preference for meat color compared to Control and Celery, and also received the lowest score for flavor.
data.target_sentence: For this reason, in the sensory evaluation of sausages, PTP showed a lower preference for meat color compared to Control and Celery, and also received the lowest score for flavor.

data.source_sentence: 토양비옥도를 유지하고 토양의 미생물 군집의 조성을 작물생육에 유리한 쪽으로 변화시키기 위해 한 가지 작물이 아닌 여러 작물의 돌려짓기를 권장하고 있으며 특히 콩과작물을 작부체계에 포함시키는 것을 권장하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to maintain soil fertility and change the composition of the soil microbial community in favor of crop growth, rotation of several crops rather than one crop is recommended, and in particular, legumes are recommended to be included in the cropping system.
data.target_sentence: In order to maintain soil fertility and change the composition of the soil microbial community in favor of crop growth, rotation of several crops rather than one crop is recommended, and in particular, the leguminous crop is recommended to be included in the cropping system.

data.source_sentence: 대풍콩은 약 15일간 육묘한후 본엽이 나왔을 때 정식하였고, 수미감자는 농촌진흥청 국립식량과학원 고령지농업연구소에서 기본식물을 제공받아 약50 g 정도의 종서를 파종하여 온실조건에서 수행되었으며, 겨울철에도 10°C 이하로 온도가 떨어지지 않도록 관리하였다.

It was managed so that the temperature did not fall below 10°C.

data.source_sentence: 모든 시험용 pot는 시험이 시작된 2015년에만 비료와 퇴비가 투입되었기 때문에 비료투입 전인 2015년 5월 20일보다 비료 투입 후인 6월 11일에 유기물을 제외하고 전반적으로 모든 양분이 증가한 것으로 나타났다.

data.source_sentence: 전 생육기에 걸쳐 콩과 감자 재배 토양에서 12종의 미생물이 공통적으로 동정되었고 콩을 재배한 토양에서는 2종, 감자를 재배한 토양에서는 5종의 작물 특이적 미생물이 추가로 동정되었다.

data.source_sentence: 초기 비료 및 퇴비 투입 후 유기물은 재배기간 내내 콩을 재배한 화분이 감자를 재배한 화분보다 높게 나타났으며 토양 중 인산은 콩을 재배한 토양에 비해 감자를 재배한 토양에서 다소 높은 경향을 보였다.

data.source_sentence: 굴은 일반적으로 11월부터 4월까지는 생식으로 많이 소비되며 5월부터 8월 사이에는 주로 냉동품, 건제품 및 통조림 등으로 가공되어 수 출되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Oysters are generally consumed as raw food from November to April, and between May and August, they are mainly processed and exported as frozen products, dry products, and canned goods.
data.target_sentence: Oysters are generally consumed as raw food from November to April, and between May and August, they are mainly processed and exported as frozen products, dry products, and canned goods.

data.source_sentence: 대부분의 굴은 탈각 후 생식용 생굴 또는 냉동굴로 유통되는 비중이 높다.
data.mt_sentence: Most oysters are distributed as raw or frozen oysters for reproductive use after shelling.
data.target_sentence: Most oysters are distributed as raw oysters for reproductive use or as frozen oysters after shelling.

data.source_sentence: 이처럼 탈각 굴에서 발생하는 SA 오염은 작업 종사자의 위생관리 소홀로 인해 탈각 공정에 지속적으로 사용되는 장갑에 의한 교차오염이 주된 원인 중의 하나로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: As such, it is considered that one of the main causes of SA contamination from shelled oysters is cross-contamination by gloves that are continuously used in the shelling process due to the negligence of workers in hygiene management.
data.target_sentence: As such, it is considered that one of the main causes of SA contamination from shelled oysters is cross-contamination by gloves that are continuously used in the shelling process due to the negligence of workers in hygiene management.

data.source_sentence: Table 2에 나타난 것처럼 작업용 장갑을 교체하지 않고 지속적으로 사용할 경우 작업시간이 경과함에 따라 SA가 지속적으로 검출되며 이로 인해 생식용 굴에 교차오염을 일으킬 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As shown in Table 2, continuous use of work gloves without replacement causes continuous detection of SA over working hours, which may cause cross contamination of reproductive oysters.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Table 2, continuous use of work gloves without replacement causes continuous detection of SA over working hours, which may cause cross-contamination of raw oysters.

data.source_sentence: 포장돈육 가공공정 중 작업자 장갑과 돈육의 교차오염도를 연구한 결과에서 면으로 구성된 장갑이 polyethylene 소재 장갑에 비해 미생물 교차 오염율이 높으며 이는 면장갑의 높은 흡수성과 관련이 있음이 보고되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: According to a study on the cross-contamination of worker gloves and pork during the processing of packaged pork, it is reported that gloves composed of cotton have higher microbial cross-contamination rate than gloves made of polyethylene, which is related to the high absorbency of cotton gloves.
data.target_sentence: According to a study on the cross-contamination of worker gloves and pork during the processing of packaged pork, it is reported that gloves composed of cotton have a higher microbial cross-contamination rate than gloves made of polyethylene, which is related to the high absorbency of cotton gloves.

data.source_sentence: 굴 탈각 공정 중에 사용되는 장갑은 면소재의 장갑으로 poly-ethylene 장갑으로 교체할 경우 오염도가 낮아질 수 있을 것으로 예상된다.
data.mt_sentence: If the gloves used during the oyster shelling process are cotton gloves and are replaced with poly-ethylene gloves, the pollution level is expected to be lowered.
data.target_sentence: If the gloves used during the oyster shelling process are cotton gloves and are replaced with poly-ethylene gloves, the pollution level is expected to be lowered.

data.source_sentence: 즉 굴 탈각 공정에 종사하는 종업원의 위생 교육과 가공 공정에 사용되는 기구 및 설비의 주기적인 세척 및 소독 등의 식품위생안전관리를 강화한다면 안전한 탈각 굴(생굴)을 생산할 수 있을 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: In other words, if hygiene education for employees in the oyster shelling process and food hygiene safety management such as periodic cleaning and disinfection of equipment and facilities used in the processing process are strengthened, safe shelling oysters can be produced.
data.target_sentence: In other words, if hygiene education for employees in the oyster shelling process and food hygiene safety management such as periodic cleaning and disinfection of equipment and facilities used in the processing process are strengthened, safe shelling oysters (raw oysters) can be produced.

data.source_sentence: 그러한 조건에서 항생제 유전자 발현으로 인한 대사체의 차이는 대사체 프로파일을 통한 분석으로는 확인하기 쉽지 않음을 알 수 있고 물질 수준의 차이를 확인하기 위해서는 질량분석기(mass spectrometry)를 활용한 연구가 뒤따라야 할 것으로 사료된다.

data.source_sentence: 자연 건조에서 선발한 세균에 의한 포트 검정을 수행하기 위해 산림토양과 퇴비의 비율이 2대 1인 밭흙을 섞어서 15일 후숙한 후 사용하였으며 고추 식물은 72구 트레이에서 3주간 키운 후 지름 12 cm의 포트에 밭흙으로 옮겨 심어 사용하였다.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 생물학적 고결 작용은 암모니아의 고농집을 발생시키는 결과를 야기하며 이러한 박테리아 물질은 단지 암모니아의 발생을 조정하여 요소분해효소가 저하되지 않는 경우에 유용하다고 하였다.

data.source_sentence: 요소분해효소는 요소를 두 개의 암모니아 분자로 가수분해됨으로써 탄산칼슘 흡착이 시작되고 이들은 글루타민, 합성글루타민, 신타아제의 경로를 생물량으로써 직접적으로 흡수되거나 글루타민산염 탈수소효소 (GDH)의 작용에 의해 흡수된다고 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Calcium carbonate adsorption is initiated by hydrolysis of urea into two ammonia molecules by urease, which are absorbed either directly as biomass through the pathways of glutamine, synthetic glutamine, and synthase, or by the action of glutamate dehydrogenase (GDH). did.
data.target_sentence: Calcium carbonate adsorption is initiated by the hydrolysis of urea into two ammonia molecules by urease, which are absorbed either directly as biomass through the pathways of glutamine, synthetic glutamine, and synthase, or by the action of glutamate dehydrogenase (GDH).

data.source_sentence: 이 중 실내시험은 먼저 광주광역시 ○○지구 택지조성 공사현장에서 채취한 화강풍화토 계열의 토사를 No. 10체로 체가름을 한 흙 시료로 다짐시험을 실시하였고 얻어진 결과를 바탕으로 최적함수비를 결정하여 공시체 제작에 있어서 다른 함수비를 적용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the indoor test, the granite weather soil-based soil collected at the construction site of the ○○ district of Gwangju was first tested with a soil sample sifted with No. 10, and the optimal water content was determined based on the obtained results.
data.target_sentence: In the indoor test, a compaction test was tested with a soil sample, which sieved the weathered granite soil-based soil using a No. 10 sieve at the construction site of the ○○ district of Gwangju, and based on the obtained results, the optimal moisture content was determined and different moisture content was applied in the preparation of the test piece.

data.source_sentence: 이 침전물을 건조시킨 후 한국기초과학지원연구원 광주분원의 전자현미경분석(SEM)과 X-회절분석(XRD)을 수행하였다.

data.source_sentence: 미생물과 토사의 반응 메카니즘을 파악하기 위하여 다양한 조건에서 토사와 미생물 등 첨가제를 변화시킨 조건에서 실내시험을 실시하였으며 침강제를 혼합한 후 반응생성물과 각각의 공시체를 전자현미경분석(SEM)과 X-회절분석(XRD)시험을 실시한 결과를 정리하면 다음과 같다.

data.source_sentence: 우리나라 식중독 발생 통계 자료에 따르면 2012년에서 2016년 사이 발생한 원인이 밝혀진 식중독 사고 중 41.8%는 채소류에 의한 것으로 육류나 어류에 의한 식중독 사고보다 비중이 높은 것으로 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: According to statistics on food poisoning outbreaks in Korea, 41.8% of the food poisoning accidents that were found to have occurred between 2012 and 2016 were caused by vegetables, which was higher than those caused by meat or fish.
data.target_sentence: According to statistics on food poisoning outbreaks in Korea, 41.8% of the food poisoning accidents that were found to have occurred between 2012 and 2016 were caused by vegetables, which was higher than those caused by meat or fish.

data.source_sentence: 조사 시기는 2018년 4월부터 2018년 10월까지, 지표수는 4월, 7월, 10월에 걸쳐 총 3차례 시료를 수집하였고 지하수는 4월, 7월로 총 2차례 시료를 수집하였다.

data.source_sentence: 지표수 시료는 AAA 비커(독일 BBB사)을 이용해 중앙지점에서 수면으로부터 2 m 이내로 채수하였고 지하수 시료는 지하수 펌프를 5분 이상 가동하여 취수정 내의 고인물을 제거한 후 채수병을 이용하여 채수하였다.

data.target_sentence: Surface water samples were collected within 2 m from the water surface at the central point using an AAA beaker (BBB, Germany), and groundwater samples were collected using a water collecting bottle after removing stagnant water in the suction well by operating the groundwater pump for more than 5 minutes.

data.source_sentence: 균주를 접종한 농업용수의 균주 밀도를 조사한 뒤 밀봉상태를 유지하며 5℃, 15℃, 25℃, 35℃ 조건의 배양기에 넣고 총 60일 동안 매 5일마다 주기적으로 E.coli O157:H7 접종 균주 밀도를 조사하였다.

The strain density was investigated.

data.source_sentence: 7월 지표수의 경우 31지점 중 모든 지점에서 검출되었고 밀도는 3.0±0.64로 나타났다.

data.source_sentence: 총 인(T-P)은 모든 지역에서 0.33~0.10 범위로 지표수와 지하수 간 차이가 크지 않았고 질산성질소(NO3-N)는 지표수에서 0.47~1.08 범위, 지하수에서 4.67~26.71 범위로 지하수에서 더 높은 경향을 보였다.

data.source_sentence: 자란만사량도 해역은 북동쪽 및 북서쪽으로는 경상남도 고성군 삼산면과 하일면, 남서쪽으로는 통영시 사량도의 해안선과 접해 있으며 남쪽은 외해로 열려 있는 반폐쇄성의 내만이다.
data.mt_sentence: The waters of Jaran Mansayangdo Island are adjacent to the coastline of Samsan-myeon and Hail-myeon, Goseong-gun, Gyeongsangnam-do to the northeast and northwest, and Saryangdo, Tongyeong to the southwest, and semi-closed inner bay open as an outer sea to the south.

data.source_sentence: 자란만사량도 해역에서 채취한 굴 84개와 육상오염원 시료 62개에서 대장균이 검출된 시료는 각각 22개(26.2%), 43개(69.4%)로 대장균은 굴보다 육상오염원에서의 2.5배 이상 높게 검출되었다.
data.mt_sentence: E. coli was detected in 84 oysters and 62 samples from land pollutants collected in the waters of Jaraen Mansa-do Island, 22 (26.2%) and 43 (69.4%), respectively, and E. coli was detected 2.5 times higher in land pollutants than oysters.
data.target_sentence: E. coli was detected in 84 oysters collected from the waters of Jaranman-Saryangdo and 62 samples from land-based pollution sources, 22 (26.2%) and 43 (69.4%), respectively, and E. coli was detected 2.5 times higher in land-based pollution sources than oysters.

data.source_sentence: 대장균이 검출된 시료에서는 총 247균주(굴 28균주, 육상오염원 219균주)의 대장균을 분리하였고 분리한 대장균을 대상으로 24종의 항생제에 대한 내성 시험 결과는 각각 Table 3과 Table 4에 나타내었다.

data.source_sentence: 보다 정밀한 내성경향 분석을 위하여 내성균 오염원 추적조사(source tracking) 및 내성인자의 분자생물학적 특성 분석 등이 병행되어야 할 것이다.

data.source_sentence: O-6 지점은 대장균 오염도가 가장 높았던 육상오염원 J6(용암포마을 하수) 지점 인근해역에 설정되어 있는 지점으로 이 지점의 굴에서 분리한 대장균의 평균 MAR index는 0.53으로 다른 지점의 굴보다 높았다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 2018년 김천 지역에서 발생되고 있는 샤인머스켓 포도의 포도송이썩음병을 일으키는 병원균을 분리 및 동정하였고 이를 효과적으로 방제하고자 방제 약제 선발 실험을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, in 2018, the pathogens causing the rot of the vinegars of the Shine Muscat grapes occurring in Gimcheon were isolated and identified, and an experiment was conducted to select a control drug to effectively control them.
data.target_sentence: In this study, in 2018, the pathogens causing the bunch rot disease of the Shine Muscat grapes occurring in Gimcheon were isolated and identified, and a drug control screening experiment was performed in order to effectively control this.

data.source_sentence: 2018년 6월~8월에 경상북도 김천시 감문면 포도 재배 농가에 있는 포도(샤인머스켓)에서 초기증상은 과실이 무르며 병이 심한 경우 검은색 포자들로 뒤덮여져 있고 포도 알맹이가 모두 떨어지는 증상을 관찰하였다.
data.mt_sentence: From June to August 2018, the initial symptoms were observed at the grape (Shine Muscat) in a grape grower in Gammun-myeon, Gimcheon-si, Gyeongsangbuk-do, where the fruit was ripe, covered with black spores in severe disease, and all the grapes fell off.
data.target_sentence: From June to August 2018, the initial symptoms were observed at the grape (Shine Muscat) in a grape growing farm in Gammun-myeon, Gimcheon-si, Gyeongsangbuk-do, where the fruit was soft, and in severe disease, it was covered with black spores, and all the grapes were dropped.

data.source_sentence: 이 곰팡이는 습도와 온도가 높은 조건에서 포자가 많이 형성되면서 포도 표면에서 부생적으로 생장함에 따라 포도 조직을 연약하게 하여 무르게 하는 증상을 유도한다고 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: This fungus is thought to induce symptoms of weakening and softening of the grape tissue as it grows as a byproduct on the surface of grapes as many spores are formed under conditions of high humidity and temperature.
data.target_sentence: This fungus is thought to induce symptoms of weakening and softening of the grape tissue as it grows saprophytically on the surface of grapes as many spores are formed under conditions of high humidity and temperature.

data.source_sentence: PDA 배지에서 배양 3일까지는 흰색과 갈색의 균사를 형성하다가 5일 후 어두운 갈색 내지 검은색의 소낭 및 분생포자가 균사를 뒤덮고 배지 뒷면은 연한 노란색을 띄었다.
data.mt_sentence: In PDA medium, white and brown mycelium were formed until 3 days after culture, and after 5 days, dark brown to black vesicles and conidia covered the mycelium, and the back side of the medium was pale yellow.
data.target_sentence: In the PDA medium, white and brown mycelium were formed until 3 days after culture, and after 5 days, dark brown or black vesicles and conidia covered the mycelium, and the back side of the medium was pale yellow.

data.source_sentence: 각 배지에서 균총의 직경을 측정하여 약제 배지와 약제를 첨가하지 않은 무처리 배지의 균총직경을 비교하여 균사 생장 억제율(%)을 계산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The mycelial growth inhibition rate (%) was calculated by measuring the diameter of the flora in each medium and comparing the diameter of the colony in the drug medium and the untreated medium without the addition of the drug.
data.target_sentence: The mycelial growth inhibition rate (%) was calculated by measuring the diameter of the flora in each medium and comparing the diameter of the colony in the drug medium and the untreated medium without the addition of the drug.

data.source_sentence: 한천희석법에 의한 결과는 균사억제효과를 보는 것이므로 보호 살균제의 경우 포자의 발아 억제실험을 추가하여야 할 것이며 또한 포장에서의 효과를 검정해 봐야 할 것으로 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the result of the agar dilution method shows the effect of inhibiting mycelium, in the case of protective disinfectants, it is necessary to add a germination inhibition experiment of spores, and also to test the effect of packaging.
data.target_sentence: Since the result of the agar dilution method shows the effect of inhibiting mycelium, in the case of protective fungicides, it is necessary to add a germination inhibition experiment of spores, and also to test the effect of packaging.

data.source_sentence: 2018년 경북 김천 지역 포도 하우스 재배 농가에서 포도송이가 무르고 마른 포도 과실이 낙과되는 피해가 발생하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In 2018, at a grape house growing farm in Gimcheon, Gyeongsangbuk-do, the grape clusters were soft and the dried grape fruits fell.
data.target_sentence: In 2018, at a grape house grower in Gimcheon, Gyeongsangbuk-do, the grape clusters that were soft and dry fell, caused damage.

data.source_sentence: A. tubingensis에 의한 포도송이 썩음병(가칭)은 2018년도부터 국내 샤인머스켓 포도에서 처음 발생된 것이 보고되었으며 효과적으로 포도송이 썩음병의 발생을 예방할 수 있는 5종의 약제를 보고했다.
data.mt_sentence: Grape cluster rot (tentative name) caused by A. tubingensis has been reported for the first time in Shine Muscat grapes in Korea since 2018, and 5 types of drugs that can effectively prevent the occurrence of cluster rot have been reported.
data.target_sentence: Bunch rot disease (tentative name) caused by A. tubingensis has been reported for the first time in Shine Muscat grapes in Korea since 2018, and 5 types of drugs that can effectively prevent the occurrence of bunch rot disease have been reported.

data.source_sentence: 사료 공급은 1일 2회(09:00, 14:00 h)에 걸쳐 만복공급(saturation)하였으며 공급 후 60분 뒤 환수를 실시하여 수조의 수질을 유지하였으며 사육은 총 8주간 진행하였다.

data.mt_sentence: Measurement and analysis of survival rate In order to investigate the effect of diatom addition in the feed on the change in body weight of the test fish, the average weight of the fish was measured after an 8-week feeding experiment to calculate the growth rate, feed efficiency, and survival rate, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 각각의 반려동물 사료 원료를 기질로 한 최적의 발효균주를 탐색하고 제조된 발효 사료의 발효성상과 invitro 소화율 및 기호성을 조사하여 노령견에게 적합한 사료인지의 여부를 알아보고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the optimal fermentation strain based on each pet food material was explored, and the fermentation properties, invitro digestion rate, and preference of the prepared fermented feed were investigated to find out whether it was suitable for old dogs.

data.source_sentence: 노령견용 발효 사료를 개발하기 위하여 12가지의 반려견 사료 원료 각각에 11가지 혹은 8가지 후보 발효균주들을 단독으로 접종하고 발효 전과 후의 pH와 암모니아성 질소 함량을 분석하여 그 변화량을 기준으로 최적의 발효균주를 선발하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to develop fermented feed for elderly dogs, 11 or 8 candidate fermented strains were individually inoculated into each of the 12 dog feed ingredients, and pH and ammonia nitrogen content were analyzed before and after fermentation to determine the optimal fermented strain based on the amount of change. was selected.
data.target_sentence: In order to develop fermented feed for elderly dogs, 11 or 8 candidate fermented strains were individually inoculated into each of the 12 dog feed ingredients, and pH and ammonia nitrogen content were analyzed before and after fermentation to select the optimal fermented strain based on the amount of change.

data.source_sentence: 이때 비발효 사료는 대조구이고 발효 사료는 처리구로 하였으며 발효 성상, invitro 건물 및 조단백질 소화율 검증 시에는 각각 3반복으로 분석하고 기호성 실험은 10반복으로 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, the non-fermented feed was the control group and the fermented feed was the treatment group. When verifying fermentation properties, invitro dry matter and crude protein digestibility, each was analyzed in 3 replicates, and in the palatability test in 10 repetitions.

data.source_sentence: 각각의 사료 원료를 155 mm(W)×90 mm(D) 지퍼백에 30 g 칭량하여 함수율 60%가 되도록 수돗물을 첨가하고 원료 g당 107 cfu의 발효균주를 접종하여 내용물을 시약스푼으로 균일하게 섞었다.
data.mt_sentence: Weigh 30 g of each feed material in a 155 mm(W)×90 mm(D) zipper bag, add tap water to obtain a moisture content of 60%, inoculate 107 cfu of fermented strain per g of raw material, and mix the contents evenly with a reagent spoon. It was.

data.source_sentence: 제조된 사료의 경우 비발효 사료(대조구)와 발효 사료(처리구)의 시료를 채취하여 분석 시까지 –20℃ 냉동고에 보관하였다가 pH, 암모니아성 질소, 휘발성 지방산 및 젖산 함량, invitro 건물 및 조단백질 소화율 그리고 기호성을 분석하였다.

Changes in the indicators were monitored.

data.source_sentence: 한편으로 예산이 부족한 지자체에서는 외부로 처리되지 않고 발생되는 잉여 슬러지를 시스템 내에서 순환시키는 방법을 사용하고 있으며, 시스템 내에서 슬러지가 순환됨으로써 방류수 수질 기준을 맞추기 어려워지는 문제가 발생하는 이중고를 겪고 있는 실정이다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, local governments with insufficient budgets are using a method of circulating surplus sludge generated without being treated externally, and it is difficult to meet the water quality standards of discharged water due to the circulation of sludge in the system.

data.source_sentence: 현실적으로 고농도 질소 유입 및 슬러지 증가를 해결하기 위하여 시설 개량을 통한 비용증가 문제보다 운전인자의 조작을 통한 처리 효율의 안정성을 우선적으로 적용해야 하는 실정이다.

data.source_sentence: FBBC의 투입 조건 중 무산소조 및 포기조에 투입하는 담체의 양은 시스템 운영 전 무산소조와 포기조 내 유동성 실험(등간격 채취된 시료내 담체량 분석)을 통하여 충전율을 결정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Among the input conditions of FBBC, the amount of carrier input to the anaerobic tank and the aeration tank was determined through a fluidity test in the anaerobic tank and the aeration tank (analysis of the amount of carrier in samples collected at equal intervals) before system operation.
data.target_sentence: Among the input conditions of FBBC, the amount of carrier input to the anaerobic tank and the aeration tank was determined through a fluidity test in the anaerobic tank and the aeration tank (analysis of the amount of carrier in samples collected at equal intervals) before system operation.

data.source_sentence: 무산소조 및 포기조 내 담체의 원활한 유동과 미생물의 적정한 활동을 위해 DO 3 mg/L이상을 유지하였으며, 담체의 유실을 방지하기 위해 수조 간벽에 여재 유실 방지망을 설치하였다.
data.mt_sentence: DO was maintained at 3 mg/L or higher for smooth flow of carriers in anaerobic and aeration tanks and proper activity of microorganisms, and a filter media loss prevention net was installed on the wall of the tank to prevent carrier loss.
data.target_sentence: DO was maintained at 3 mg/L or higher for smooth flow of carriers in anaerobic and aeration tanks and proper activity of microorganisms, and a filter media loss prevention net was installed on the wall of the tank to prevent carrier loss.

data.source_sentence: 3단계로 포기조는 유기물의 산화와 안정적인 질산화를 위해 연속흐름 혼합된 반응조 형태로 포기조의 산소 공급 및 교반을 위해 산기 장치를 반응조 내에 균등하게 분배하여 배치하였으며, 미생물을 안정적으로 유지하기 위해 담체를 충전하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the third step, the abandonment tank was distributed evenly in the reaction tank for oxygen supply and stirring of the abandonment tank in the form of a reaction tank mixed with continuous flow for oxidation and stable nitrification of organic matter, and the carrier was filled to keep microorganisms stable.
data.target_sentence: In the third step, the abandonment tank was distributed evenly in the reaction tank for oxygen supply and stirring of the abandonment tank in the form of a reaction tank mixed with continuous flow for oxidation and stable nitrification of organic matter, and the carrier was filled to keep microorganisms stable.

data.source_sentence: 무산소조는 시스템 운영 기간이 길어질수록 수온이 낮은 동절기임에도 불구하고 반응조 생물 활성화에 따라 FBBC 부착 미생물의 양이 증가하였으며, 포기조의 경우 포기와 FBBC의 미생물 부착능에 따라 부착미생물의 양이 유지되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Although the water temperature of the anaerobic group was low in winter as the system operation period increased, the amount of microorganisms attached to the FBBC increased due to activation of the reaction tank, and in the case of the abandon group, the amount of microorganisms was maintained according to the microbial adhesion of the FBBC.
data.target_sentence: Although the water temperature of the anaerobic group was low in winter as the system operation period increased, the amount of microorganisms attached to the FBBC increased due to activation of the reaction tank, and in the case of the abandon group, the amount of microorganisms was maintained according to the microbial adhesion of the FBBC.

data.source_sentence: 포기조의 경우 연구 종료 후 무산소조에서 탈질 효율이 증가됨에 따라 포기조로 유입되는 유기물의 농도가 감소하였으며, 이에 따라 Nitrosomonas, Nitrospira 등과 같은 질산화 미생물의 분포가 2배 이상 증가하는 경향을 나타냈다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of abandonment group, as the denitrification efficiency increased in the anaerobic group after the study, the concentration of organic matter introduced into the abandonment group decreased, and accordingly, the distribution of nitric oxide microorganisms such as Nitrosomonas and Nitrospira tended to increase more than twice.
data.target_sentence: In the case of abandonment group, as the denitrification efficiency increased in the anaerobic group after the study, the concentration of organic matter introduced into the abandonment group decreased, and accordingly, the distribution of nitric oxide microorganisms such as Nitrosomonas and Nitrospira tended to increase more than twice.

data.source_sentence: SS, T-P 그리고 PO4-P 의 경우 무산소조의 농도가 유입수보다 높은 것은 포기조로부터 내부 반송된 슬러지에 의한 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of SS, T-P, and PO4-P, the concentration of the anaerobic tank is higher than that of the inflow water because of the sludge transferred from the abandon tank to the inside.

data.source_sentence: T-N의 경우 무산소조에서 65%의 제거율을 보였으나 최종 유출수에서 68.5%의 가장 낮은 제거율을 보인 것은 무산소조에서의 탈질과 포기조에서의 질산화에 영향을 받았기 때문이다.

data.source_sentence: 운동 선수와 일반인의 장내 미생물의 구성의 차이를 비교해 볼 때 운동 선수 그룹에서 더 풍부한 장내 미생물을 구성을 하고 있는 것으로 나타났고, 그 종류도 다양한 것으로 관찰되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Comparing the difference in the composition of intestinal microbes between athletes and the general public, it was found that the athletes group had a more abundant intestinal microflora, and the variety was also observed.
data.target_sentence: Comparing the difference in the composition of intestinal microbes between athletes and the general public, it was found that the athletes group had a more abundant intestinal microflora, and the variety was also observed.

data.source_sentence: 높은 수준의 탄수화물 섭취량을 해야 하는 운동선수에게는 단쇄 지방산의 양이 증가될 것이며, 이는 다양한 운동 종목에 따라 장내 미생물의 적응 및 직접적으로 장내 건강과 밀접한 관계가 있는 세포분자 신호 전달에 영향을 미칠 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The amount of short-chain fatty acids will increase for athletes who need high levels of carbohydrate intake, which will affect the adaptation of intestinal microorganisms and the transmission of cell molecular signals directly related to intestinal health, depending on various exercise events.
data.target_sentence: The amount of short-chain fatty acids will increase for athletes who need high levels of carbohydrate intake, which will affect the adaptation of intestinal microorganisms and the transmission of cell molecular signals directly related to intestinal health, depending on various exercise events.

data.source_sentence: 종합하자면, 운동 유형 및 장내 영양의 과잉에 따른 장내 미생물의 구성 변화는 장내 미생물의 변형과 교란을 일으키는 요인임과 동시에 장내 미생물을 회복시키는 기능을 하는 것을 시사한다고 할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In summary, it can be said that changes in the composition of intestinal microorganisms due to exercise type and excessive intestinal nutrition are factors that cause deformation and disturbance of intestinal microorganisms and at the same time suggest functioning to restore intestinal microorganisms.
data.target_sentence: In summary, it can be said that changes in the composition of intestinal microorganisms due to exercise type and excessive intestinal nutrition are factors that cause deformation and disturbance of intestinal microorganisms and at the same time suggest functioning to restore intestinal microorganisms.

data.source_sentence: 반응값에 대한 분산 분석을 진행한 결과 결정계수(R-square) 값이 1에 가까운 수치인 0.9193을 나타내었고, p-value 값이 0.05보다 낮은 0.0044으로 가정된 모델에 대한 높은 유의성 및 실험 모형의 적합도를 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of ANOVA on the reaction value, the coefficient of determination (R-square) was 0.9193, which is close to 1, and the high significance and suitability of the experimental model were confirmed for the model assumed to have a p-value value of 0.0044 lower than 0.05.
data.target_sentence: As a result of ANOVA on the reaction value, the coefficient of determination (R-square) was 0.9193, which is close to 1, and the high significance and suitability of the experimental model were noted for the model assumed to have a p-value value of 0.0044 lower than 0.05.

data.source_sentence: 선별 균주를 대상으로 protease 대량 생산을 위한 산업적 배지 조건을 확립하기 위해 통계학적 분석기법인 반응표면 분석법을 활용하여 배지 최적화를 수행하였고, 그 결과 일반 LB 배지보다 효율적으로 높은 생산량을 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to establish industrial culture medium conditions for mass production of protease for selected strains, culture medium optimization was performed using the response surface analysis method, which showed higher production than general LB culture medium.
data.target_sentence: In order to establish industrial culture medium conditions for mass production of protease for selected strains, culture medium optimization was performed using the response surface analysis method, which showed higher production than general LB culture medium.

data.source_sentence: 각각의 시험구로 4개의 우방을 이용하였으며, 우방당 5마리 한우 암소를 공시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Four rainbows were used as each test tool, and five Korean cattle cows were disclosed per raincoat.
data.target_sentence: Four rainbows were used as each test tool, and five Korean cattle cows were disclosed per raincoat.

data.source_sentence: 시험구로는 축사 바닥에 광물질 첨가제를 첨가하지 않은 무첨가구(CON), bentonite를 1% 첨가한 시험구(BN), illite를 1% 첨가한 시험구(IL), fly-ash를 1% 첨가한 시험구(FA)로 4개의 시험구를 두었으며, 시험 기간은 총 4주간 실시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Four test balls were installed as additive-free furniture (CON) without mineral additives on the bottom of the barn, test tools (BN) with 1% bentonite (IL), and test tools (FA) with 1% fly-ash (IL), and the test period was conducted for a total of 4 weeks.
data.target_sentence: Four test balls were installed as additive-free furniture (CON) without mineral additives on the bottom of the barn, test tools (BN) with 1% bentonite (IL), and test tools (FA) with 1% fly-ash (IL), and the test period was conducted for a total of 4 weeks.

data.source_sentence: 사료 급여는 오전 8시와 오후 5시에 각각 급여하였으며, 1일 두당 이탈리안라이그라스 5 ㎏, 번식우용 농후사료 2 ㎏을 급여하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Feed was fed at 8 am and 5 pm, respectively, and 5 kg of Italian ryegrass and 2 kg of rich feed for breeding cattle were fed per head per day.
data.target_sentence: Feed was fed at 8 am and 5 pm, respectively, and 5 kg of Italian ryegrass and 2 kg of rich feed for breeding cattle were fed per head per day.

data.source_sentence: 분석을 위하여 시험 0, 7, 14, 21 및 28일차에 우방 5곳에서 우분을 5 ㎏ 채취하여 분석에 이용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For analysis, 5kg of milk powder was collected from 5 friendly places on the 0, 7, 14, 21 and 28 days of the test and used for analysis.
data.target_sentence: For analysis, 5kg of cow manure was collected from 5 friendly places on the 0, 7, 14, 21 and 28 days of the test and used for analysis.

data.source_sentence: 우분 중 미생물 조성을 분석하기 위해 채취한 우분 시료 1 g과 멸균 희석액(0.84% NaCl)으로 10진 희석법에 따라 희석한 후 균수 측정에 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was used for measuring the number of bacteria after diluting 1 g of a cow sample collected to analyze the composition of the microorganisms in the cow cow according to the decimal dilution method with a sterile diluent (0.84% NaCl).
data.target_sentence: It was used for measuring the number of bacteria after diluting 1 g of a cow sample collected to analyze the composition of the microorganisms in the cow  according to the decimal dilution method with a sterile diluent (0.84% NaCl).

data.source_sentence: 광물질 첨가제가 한우 번식우 바닥의 건물 함량 변화에 미치는 영향을 조사한 결과는 Fig. 1과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The results of investigating the effect of mineral additives on the change in the dry matter content of the floor of Korean cattle breeding are shown in Fig. equal to 1.

data.source_sentence: 광물질 첨가제가 한우 번식우 바닥의 대장균 수 변화에 미치는 영향을 조사한 결과는 Fig. 7과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The results of investigating the effect of mineral additives on the change in the number of E. coli in the bottom of Korean cattle breeding are shown in Fig. Same as 7.
data.target_sentence: The results of investigating the effect of mineral additives on the change in the number of E. coli in the bottom of Korean breeding cattle are shown in Fig. 7.

data.source_sentence: AAA에 의하면 석회와 fly-ash를 양돈 분뇨에 첨가하여 알칼리성으로 안정화한 후 8일간 배양하였을 때, 대장균과 살모넬라는 모두 감소하였다고 보고하였는데, 본 연구에서도 유사한 결과를 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: According to AAA, it was reported that both E. coli and salmonella decreased when lime and fly-ash were added to pig manure to stabilize them alkaline and cultured for 8 days, and similar results were shown in this study.
data.target_sentence: According to AAA, it was reported that both E. coli and salmonella decreased when lime and fly-ash were added to pig manure to stabilize them alkaline and cultured for 8 days, and similar results were shown in this study.

data.source_sentence: 광물질 첨가제가 한우 번식우 바닥의 살모넬라 수 변화에 미치는 영향을 조사한 결과는 Fig. 8과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 8 shows the results of investigating the effect of mineral additives on the change in the number of salmonella in the bottom of Korean beef breeding cattle.
data.target_sentence: Figure 8 shows the results of investigating the effect of mineral additives on the change in the number of salmonella in the bottom of Korean breeding cattle.

data.source_sentence: 광물질 첨가제가 한우 번식우 바닥의 일반 성분, 발효 특성, 미생물 및 가스 발생량 변화에 미치는 영향을 28일간 평균값으로 분석한 결과는 Table 1과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 1 shows the results of analyzing the effects of mineral additives on changes in the general components, fermentation characteristics, microorganisms and gas generation of the bottom of Korean cattle breeding as average values for 28 days.
data.target_sentence: Table 1 shows the results of analyzing the effects of mineral additives on changes in the general components, fermentation characteristics, microorganisms and gas generation of the bottom of Korean breeding cattle as average values for 28 days.

data.source_sentence: 이상의 결과를 종합하면, 본 연구에서는 광물질 첨가제를 한우 번식우 바닥 환경에 미치는 영향을 조사하기 위하여 수행하였으며, IL 시험구에서 병원성 미생물인 대장균 수가 가장 낮았으며, IL과 FA 시험구에서는 살모넬라 수가 가장 낮았다.
data.mt_sentence: In summary, in this study, mineral additives were performed to investigate the effect on the floor environment of Korean beef breeding cattle, and the number of E. coli, a pathogenic microorganism, was the lowest in IL test zones, and salmonella was the lowest in IL and FA test zones.
data.target_sentence: In summary, in this study, mineral additives were performed to investigate the effect on the floor environment of Korean breeding cattle, and the number of E. coli, a pathogenic microorganism, was the lowest in IL test zones, and salmonella was the lowest in IL and FA test zones.

data.source_sentence: 문제는 굴 양식에서 생산되는 굴 껍질인 패각의 발생량이 매년 증가되어 제대로 처리되지 않은 채 버려지게 되어 환경 오염과 처리 비용을 유발한다는 점에서 이슈화되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The problem is that the amount of shell, an oyster shell produced in oyster farming, increases every year and is discarded without proper treatment, causing environmental pollution and treatment costs.
data.target_sentence: The problem is that the amount of shell, an oyster shell produced in oyster farming, increases every year and is discarded without proper treatment, causing environmental pollution and treatment costs.

data.source_sentence: 굴 패각을 적절한 방법으로 처리하여 굴 패각분말(oyster shellpowder)을 이용하여 한우분에 적용하여 퇴비로서 가치를 평가한 연구는 거의 없다.
data.mt_sentence: Few studies have evaluated the value of oyster shell as a compost by treating oyster shell in an appropriate way and applying it to Korean beef using an oyster shell powder.
data.target_sentence: Few studies have evaluated the value of oyster shell as a compost by treating oyster shell in an appropriate way and applying it to Korean cow manure using an oyster shell powder.

data.source_sentence: 본 실험에 사용한 우분은 2020년 10월 한우 농장에서 채취하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The milk powder used in this experiment was collected from a Korean beef farm in October 2020.
data.target_sentence: The cow manure used in this experiment was collected from a Korean cattle farm in October 2020.

data.source_sentence: 한우분의 특성인 건물, 유기물 및 조회분 함량은 0, 2, 4 및 8일에 5 g의 샘플을 채취하여 분석에 이용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Dry matter, organic matter, and raw material content, which are characteristics of Korean beef meal, were analyzed by taking 5 g samples on days 0, 2, 4 and 8.
data.target_sentence: Dry matter, organic matter, and raw material content, which are characteristics of Korean cow manure, were analyzed by taking 5 g samples on days 0, 2, 4 and 8.

data.source_sentence: 미생물은 배양 0, 2, 4 및 8일에 채취한 우분 1 g과 멸균 희석액(0.84% NaCl)으로 10진 희석법에 따라 희석 후균수 측정을 위하여 각 희석 단계의 희석액을 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Microorganisms were diluted with 1 g of milk powder collected on 0, 2, 4, and 8 days of culture and sterilized diluent (0.84% NaCl), and diluted solution of each dilution step was used to measure the number of bacteria after dilution according to the decimal dilution method.
data.target_sentence: Microorganisms were diluted with 1 g of cow manure collected on 0, 2, 4, and 8 days of culture and sterilized diluent (0.84% NaCl), and diluted solution of each dilution step was used to measure the number of bacteria after dilution according to the decimal dilution method.

data.source_sentence: Table 1은 굴 패각분말을 한우분에 첨가 시 저장 기간에 따라 건물, 유기물 및 조회분 함량 결과를 요약하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 1 summarizes the results of dry matter, organic matter and raw meal content according to the storage period when oyster shell powder is added to Korean beef meal.
data.target_sentence: Table 1 summarizes the results of dry matter, organic matter and raw meal content according to the storage period when oyster shell powder is added to Korean cow manure.

data.source_sentence: 건물과 조회분 함량은 대조구보다 굴 패각분말의 처리구에서 높았지만, 유기물 함량은 반대의 결과를 보여주었다.
data.mt_sentence: The dry matter and raw material content were higher in the oyster shell powder treatment group than in the control group, but the organic matter content showed the opposite result.
data.target_sentence: The dry matter and raw material content were higher in the oyster shell powder treatment group than in the control group, but the organic matter content showed the opposite result.

data.source_sentence: AAA에서는 퇴비 내에서 다양한 미생물이 상호 공존을 통해 토양에 환원될 경우 토양 내 미생물의 대사 산물에 의한 효소 활성이 증대되어 작물에 유익한 영양분을 제공한다고 보고한 바 있다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA reported that when various microorganisms in the compost coexist and are reduced to the soil, the enzyme activity by the metabolites of the microorganisms in the soil increases, thereby providing beneficial nutrients to crops.
data.target_sentence: AAA reported that when various microorganisms in the compost coexist and are reduced to the soil, the enzyme activity by the metabolites of the microorganisms in the soil increases, thereby providing beneficial nutrients to crops.

data.source_sentence: 전체적으로 살모넬라와 대장균은 굴 패각분말에 처리했을 경우 통계적 유의성은 없었고(p>0.05), 저장기간 동안 두드러진 특징은 관측되지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: Overall, Salmonella and Escherichia coli had no statistical significance when treated with oyster shell powder (p>0.05), and no remarkable characteristics were observed during storage.
data.target_sentence: Overall, Salmonella and Escherichia coli had no statistical significance when treated with oyster shell powder (p>0.05), and no remarkable characteristics were observed during storage.

data.source_sentence: 저장 기간에 따라 분석한 건물과 조회분 함량은 대조구보다 굴 패각분말 처리구에서 높았지만, 유기물 함량은 반대의 결과를 보여 주었다.
data.mt_sentence: The dry matter and raw material content analyzed according to the storage period were higher in the oyster shell powder treated group than in the control group, but the organic matter content showed the opposite result.
data.target_sentence: The dry matter and raw material content analyzed according to the storage period were higher in the oyster shell powder treated group than in the control group, but the organic matter content showed the opposite result.

data.source_sentence: 미생물(유산균, 효모균 및 고초균)과 병원성 미생물(살모넬라와 대장균)의 경우 저장 기간에 따라 한우분에 굴 패각분말 처리 시 두드러진 영향을 관측하지못했다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of microorganisms (lactic acid bacteria, yeast and Bacillus subtilis) and pathogenic microorganisms (Salmonella and Escherichia coli), no significant effect was observed when processing oyster shell powder on Korean beef meal depending on the storage period.
data.target_sentence: In the case of microorganisms (lactic acid bacteria, yeast and Bacillus subtilis) and pathogenic microorganisms (Salmonella and Escherichia coli), no significant effect was observed when processing oyster shell powder on Korean cow manure depending on the storage period.

data.source_sentence: 결론적으로, 굴 패각분말 1% 처리는 퇴비화 과정에서 미생물보다 한우분의 특성에 긍정적인 영향을 미쳤다.
data.mt_sentence: In conclusion, treatment with 1% oyster shell powder had a more positive effect on the characteristics of Korean beef meal than microorganisms during the composting process.
data.target_sentence: In conclusion, treatment with 1% oyster shell powder had a more positive effect on the characteristics of Korean cow manure than microorganisms during the composting process.

data.source_sentence: 생산성 면에서 굴패각 처리를 위해 한우분에 적용 시 유기질 비료로서 가치를 재평가하기 위해서는 첨가 비율, 퇴비화 과정에서 미치는 영향, 악취 저감 등 다른 관전에서의 연구가 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In terms of productivity, in order to re-evaluate the value as an organic fertilizer when applied to Korean beef meal for oyster shell treatment, it is necessary to study other aspects such as the addition ratio, the effect on composting process, and the reduction of odor.
data.target_sentence: In terms of productivity, in order to re-evaluate the value as an organic fertilizer when applied to Korean cow manure for oyster shell treatment, it is necessary to study other aspects such as the addition ratio, the effect on composting process, and the reduction of odor.

data.source_sentence: 바이오매스는 재생 및 재활용이 가능한 에너지원이고, CO2 중립 연료이며 석탄에 대한석탄에 대한 SO2, NOx 및 중금속 배출량을 줄일 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Biomass is a renewable and recyclable energy source, a CO2-neutral fuel and can reduce SO2, NOx and heavy metal emissions from coal to coal.
data.target_sentence: Biomass is a renewable and recyclable energy source, a CO2-neutral fuel and can reduce SO2, NOx and heavy metal emissions from coal to coal.

data.source_sentence: CO2 중립 연료인 바이오매스를 열 분해 또는 발효 과정을 통해 바이오에너지로 전환하여 에너지원으로 사용할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Biomass, a CO2-neutral fuel, can be converted into bioenergy through thermal decomposition or fermentation and used as an energy source.
data.target_sentence: Biomass, a CO2-neutral fuel, can be converted into bioenergy through thermal decomposition or fermentation and used as an energy source.

data.source_sentence: 반탄화 공정은 약 573 K의 온도에서 진행되는 열화학적 공정이며, 반탄화 온도에서 산소-수소 결합체인 헤미셀룰로오스가 분해되며, 이산화탄소 및 일산화탄소, 메탄, 타르 등의 휘발성 가스 (CO, CO2, N2, CH4 및 탄화수소)를 발생하여 분리가 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The torrefaction process is a thermochemical process that proceeds at a temperature of about 573 K. At the torrefaction temperature, hemicellulose, an oxygen-hydrogen bond, is decomposed, and volatile gases such as carbon dioxide and carbon monoxide, methane, and tar (CO, CO2, N2, CH4) and hydrocarbons) are generated and separated.
data.target_sentence: The torrefaction process is a thermochemical process that proceeds at a temperature of about 573 K, and at the torrefaction temperature, hemicellulose, an oxygen-hydrogen bond, is decomposed, and volatile gases such as carbon dioxide and carbon monoxide, methane, and tar (CO, CO2, N2, CH4) and hydrocarbons) are generated and separated.

data.source_sentence: 초기 바이오매스 샘플의 중량은 6.5 g이 었지만, 반탄화를 진행한 후 무게는 톱밥의 중량이 4.3 g으로 회수율이 가장 높았고, 쌀겨의 중량은 3.4 g으로 회수율이 가장 낮았다.
data.mt_sentence: The initial weight of the biomass sample was 6.5 g, but after torrefaction, the weight of sawdust was 4.3 g and the recovery rate was the highest, and the weight of rice bran was 3.4 g, and the recovery rate was the lowest.
data.target_sentence: The initial weight of the biomass sample was 6.5 g, but after torrefaction, the weight of sawdust was 4.3 g and the recovery rate was the highest, and the weight of rice bran was 3.4 g, and the recovery rate was the lowest.

data.source_sentence: Daniel Nevas 등의 보고에 따르면 673 K 온도에서 바이오매스 내에 산소-수소 결합체인 헤미셀룰로오스가 분해되며, 이산화탄소 및 일산화탄소, 메탄, 타르 등의 휘발성 가스(CO, CO2, N2, CH4 및 탄화수소)가 발생하여 분리된다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 체계적 문헌 고찰을 이용하여 대변 배양 검사에서 카바페넴 내성 장내세균 속균종(CRE) 혹은 반코마이신 내성 장구균(VRE)의 집락화가확인된 환자를 대상으로 하는 대변 세균총 이식의 안전성 및 탈집락을 위한 유효성을 검토하였다.

data.source_sentence: 대변 세균총 이식은 건강한 사람의 대변 세균총을 환자에게 이식하는 시술로, 공여자의 정상 대변의 미생물 군집이 환자의 다양한 미생물 군집을 복원함으로써 MDROs (multidrug-resistant organisms)에 의한 장내 집락화를 감소시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: Fecal flora transplantation is a procedure in which the fecal flora of a healthy person is transplanted into a patient, and the microbial community of the donor's normal feces restores the patient's diverse microbial community, thereby reducing intestinal colonization caused by MDROs (multidrug-resistant organisms).

data.source_sentence: 저장 40일의 김치를 관능 검사한 결과 KAPP 용기에 저장된 김치가 시판 KPP, KST, KPC 용기의 김치에 비하여 전반적으로 외관, 냄새, 맛 및 전반적인 기호도 항목에서 관능적인 점수가 높았다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of sensory testing of kimchi stored for 40 days, kimchi stored in KAPP containers generally showed higher sensory scores in appearance, smell, taste, and overall preference compared to kimchi in commercially available KPP, KST, and KPC containers.
data.target_sentence: As a result of sensory testing of kimchi stored for 40 days, kimchi stored in KAPP containers generally showed higher sensory scores in appearance, smell, taste, and overall preference compared to kimchi in commercially available KPP, KST, and KPC containers.

data.source_sentence: 이를 통해 자생 식물의 추출물을 첨가하여 개발한 항균 용기가 시판 3가지 저장 용기와 비교했을 때 젖산 발효에 효과적임을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this, it was confirmed that the antibacterial container developed by adding the extract of the native plant was effective in lactic acid fermentation compared to the three commercially available storage containers, and it was also confirmed that it was excellent in the sense of sensuality.
data.target_sentence: Through this, it was confirmed that the antibacterial container developed by adding the extract of the native plant was effective in lactic acid fermentation compared to the three commercially available storage containers.

data.source_sentence: 특히 발효, 숙성되면서 풍미는 저하되는데 그러므로 김치의 풍미 변화를 최소화하기 위해서 김치의 발효 속도 및 저장성에 관한 연구들이 많이 진행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, the flavor decreases as it is fermented and aged, and therefore, many studies have been conducted on the fermentation rate and storage properties of kimchi to minimize changes in the flavor of kimchi.
data.target_sentence: In particular, the flavor decreases as it is fermented and aged, and therefore, many studies have been conducted on the fermentation rate and storage properties of kimchi to minimize changes in the flavor of kimchi.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 김치의 풍미 변화는 발효 숙성 과정에서의 pH, 산도, 환원당 등의 이화학적 변화와 미생물학적 변화에 기인하며 이러한 변화를 통해서 김치의 숙성도를 알수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This change in flavor of kimchi is due to physicochemical changes and microbiological changes such as pH, acidity, and reducing sugar during fermentation and maturation, and through these changes, the degree of ripeness of kimchi can be known.
data.target_sentence: This change in flavor of kimchi is due to physicochemical changes and microbiological changes such as pH, acidity, and reducing sugar during fermentation and maturation, and through these changes, the degree of ripeness of kimchi can be known.

data.source_sentence: 김치의 발효와 맛은 김치의 재료와 제조 방법, 보관 온도는 물론 저장 용기에 의해서도 크게 좌우되는 것으로 판단되었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was judged that the fermentation and taste of kimchi was greatly influenced by the material, manufacturing method, storage temperature, and storage container of kimchi.
data.target_sentence: It was judged that the fermentation and taste of kimchi was greatly influenced by the material, manufacturing method, storage temperature, and storage container of kimchi.

data.source_sentence: 김치를 포함한 많은 발효 식품들의 저장 용기로 옹기가 사용되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: Onggi has been used as a storage container for many fermented foods, including kimchi.
data.target_sentence: Pottery has been used as a storage container for many fermented foods, including kimchi.

data.source_sentence: 옹기는 무겁고 깨지기 쉬운 단점과 주거 공간의 서구화로 인하여 플라스틱, 김치냉장고용 용기(polypropylene), 스테인레스스틸, 알루미늄이나 그리고 유리 용기 등으로 대체되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: Onggi has been replaced by plastic, kimchi refrigerator containers (polypropylene), stainless steel, aluminum, and glass containers due to the disadvantage of being heavy and fragile and the westernization of living space.
data.target_sentence: Pottery has been replaced by plastic, kimchi refrigerator containers (polypropylene), stainless steel, aluminum, and glass containers due to the disadvantage of being heavy and fragile and the westernization of living space.

data.source_sentence: 김치를 비롯한 발효 식품의 상품화가 이루어지면서 저장 용기로 옹기보다는 가볍고 편리한 플라스틱 용기 등의 사용이 늘어난 것으로 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: With the commercialization of fermented foods including kimchi, it is thought that the use of light and convenient plastic containers rather than pottery as storage containers has increased.
data.target_sentence: With the commercialization of fermented foods including kimchi, it is thought that the use of light and convenient plastic containers rather than pottery as storage containers has increased.

data.source_sentence: 김치 발효 및 저장 용기는 미생물학적 측면에서 김치의 품질과 발효 과정에 큰 영향을 줄 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Kimchi fermentation and storage containers can have a great influence on the quality and fermentation process of kimchi in terms of microbiology.
data.target_sentence: Kimchi fermentation and storage containers can have a great influence on the quality and fermentation process of kimchi in terms of microbiology.

data.source_sentence: 즉, 김치는 저온에서 숙성 및 저장시키는 과정을 거치므로 젖산균과 같은 유용 미생물의 증식과 그 대사산물이 용기의 재질적 특성과 통기성에 영향을 미칠 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In other words, since kimchi undergoes a process of aging and storing at low temperatures, the proliferation of useful microorganisms such as lactic acid bacteria and their metabolites can affect the material characteristics and breathability of the container.
data.target_sentence: In other words, since kimchi undergoes a process of aging and storing at low temperatures, the proliferation of useful microorganisms such as lactobacillus and their metabolites can affect the material characteristics and permeability of the container.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 선행 연구에서 천연 자생식물을 항균 소재로 선발하고 그 추출물을 첨가한 식품 저장 용기를 개발하여 항균활성을 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: First, in a previous study, natural native plants were selected as antibacterial materials, and food storage containers containing the extract were developed to compare antibacterial activity.
data.target_sentence: First, in a previous study, natural native plants were selected as antibacterial materials, and food storage containers containing the extract were developed to compare antibacterial activity.

data.source_sentence: 김치의 제조 방법 및 배합비는 아름다운 한국 음식 300선의 방법을 일부 변형하여 본 실험에 사용하였다.

data.target_sentence: The production method and mixing ratio of kimchi were used in this experiment by partially modifying the method of 300 beautiful Korean foods.

data.source_sentence: 실험에 사용된 배추김치는 총 15 kg을 생산하여 50일간 저장하면서 저장 중의 발효 특성을 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A total of 15 kg of cabbage kimchi used in the experiment was produced and stored for 50 days, and the fermentation characteristics during storage were compared.
data.target_sentence: A total of 15 kg of cabbage kimchi used in the experiment was produced and stored for 50 days, and the fermentation characteristics during storage were compared.

data.source_sentence: 실험에 사용된 저장 용기는 1900×1500×700 mm의 크기로 자생식물 소재를 첨가하여 개발된 용기와 시판 용기를 비교군으로 사용하였다.

data.target_sentence: The storage container used in the experiment was 1900×1500×700 mm, and the container developed by adding native plant materials and the commercial container were used as a comparison group.

data.source_sentence: 즉 용기 표면에 접촉하는 김치 시료의 양을 최대한으로 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: That is, the amount of the kimchi sample in contact with the surface of the container was maximized.

data.source_sentence: 자생식물 추출물을 첨가한 용기는 선행연구에서 개발된 것으로 항균활성과 열 안정성이 우수한 어성초, 유근피, 솔잎, 녹차, 황련의 추출물을 첨가하여 제조하였다.

data.target_sentence: The container with native plant extracts was developed in previous studies and was prepared by adding extracts of Eoseongcho, Slippery elm, pine needles, green tea, and yellow lotus with excellent antibacterial activity and thermal stability.

data.source_sentence: 김치 시료는 4가지의 저장 용기에 50일간 저장하면서 5일마다 채취하여 김치의 총 균수와 대장균군수의 변화 특성을 비교 관찰하였다.

data.source_sentence: 김치는 각각의 용기에서 30 g씩 채취하여 hand blender로 마쇄한 뒤 3겹의 거즈로 걸러내어 시료로 사용하였다.

data.target_sentence: 30 g of kimchi was collected from each container, ground with a hand blender, and filtered through three layers of gauze to use as a sample.

data.source_sentence: 관능검사에 사용한 김치는 김치의 최적 숙기인 40일째의 저장 김치를 사용하였다.

data.source_sentence: 시료를 1회용 흰색 폴리에틸렌 접시에 각각 20 g씩 나누어 담았으며 한 개의 시료를 먹고 난 다음 물로 헹군 뒤 평가하도록 하였다.

data.source_sentence: 김치는 자체의 호기성 미생물들에 의해 김치 중의 산소가 제거되어 내염성 젖산균들이 자라나게 되고 그 젖산균들의 생성으로 인해 호기성균은 사멸하게 된다.

data.target_sentence: The oxygen in kimchi is removed by its own aerobic microorganisms, causing inflammatory lactobacillus to grow, and the production of the lactobacillus kills the aerobic bacteria.

data.source_sentence: 발효 후기에는 Lactobacillus 속이 증식하고 젖산균의 증가 정도와 환원당 함량과 가장 관련이 높은 것으로 보고되었다.

data.mt_sentence: In this experiment, all four containers showed a rapid increase in the number of bacteria in the early stages of storage, and the pattern of increase and decrease in the total number of bacteria was similar.

data.source_sentence: 김치에 존재하는 미생물이 약 200여 가지로 다양한 미생물에 대한 제어와 저장 중 발효에 의해 항상 같은 저장 조건을 유지하고 있는가에 대한 깊이 있는 후속 연구가 필요할 것이다.

data.target_sentence: An in-depth follow-up study will be needed on whether the microorganisms present in kimchi always maintain the same storage conditions by control of about 200 different microorganisms and fermentation during storage.

data.mt_sentence: These results are also expected to properly increase the antibacterial properties of the KAPP container and the subsequent increase in the number of lactic acid bacteria.

data.source_sentence: 김치의 숙성은 미생물의 작용에 의해서 시작된다.
