data.target_sentence: The ripening of kimchi is initiated by the action of microorganisms.

data.source_sentence: 젖산균은 김치의 당을 젖산으로 바꾸어 김치의 맛을 산뜻하게 해 주고 유해균을 사멸시켜 저장성과 위생성을 부여한다.
data.mt_sentence: Lactic acid bacteria convert the sugar of kimchi into lactic acid to freshen the taste of kimchi and kill harmful bacteria to provide storage and hygiene.
data.target_sentence: Lactobacillus convert the sugar of kimchi into lactic acid to freshen the taste of kimchi and kill harmful bacteria to provide storage and hygiene.

data.source_sentence: 저장 기간이 증가할수록 젖산균의 증가가 산도를 높이는 원인이 된다.
data.mt_sentence: As the storage period increases, the increase in lactic acid bacteria causes an increase in acidity.
data.target_sentence: As the storage period increases, the increase in lactobacillus causes an increase in acidity.

data.source_sentence: 저장 용기의 종류에 따른 관능적 특성과 기호도에 대해 서술하고자 한다.

data.source_sentence: 실험에 사용된 저장 용기는 선행연구를 통해 개발된 항균 용기(KAPP)와 기존 시판 용기로서 폴리프로필렌 용기(KPP), 스테인레스 스틸 용기(KST), 포세린 용기(KPC)를 포함하여 총 4가지였다.

data.target_sentence: There were a total four storage containers used in the experiment, including antibacterial containers (KAPP) developed through previous studies and polypropylene containers (KPP), stainless steel containers (KST), and porcelain containers (KPC) as existing commercial containers.

data.source_sentence: 총균수 측정 결과 저장 초기에 급격한 균수의 증가를 보였으며 이후 감소하였는데 KAPP 용기에 저장된 김치의 총균수가 나머지 3개의 시판 용기보다 낮은 속도로 이루어진 것으로 판단된다.

data.source_sentence: 대장균군 수는 저장 초기에 급격하게 증가하여 저장 15일째 4가지 시료 모두 5.54∼5.81 logCFU/mL 범위로 가장 최대치로 측정되었으나 이후 모든 저장 용기에서 대장균군 수는 감소하는 경향을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: The number of coliforms increased rapidly at the beginning of storage, and on the 15th day of storage, all four samples were measured to the maximum in the range of 5.54 to 5.81 logCFU/mL, but after that, the number of coliforms in all storage containers showed a tendency to decrease.
data.target_sentence: The number of E. coli increased rapidly at the beginning of storage, and on the 15th day of storage, all four samples were measured to the maximum in the range of 5.54 to 5.81 logCFU/mL, but after that, the number of E. coli in all storage containers showed a tendency to decrease.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 김치 저장 실험의 오차를 최소화하기 위해 저장일수에 맞추어 소량씩 소분하여 저장하였기에 미생물 발효 양상을 관찰하는 데 한계가 있었다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 다양한 상대습도(11~93%) 조건에서 해조류의 미생물 안정성 및 품질 특성에 미치는 영향을 조사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study investigated the effects of seaweed on microbial stability and quality characteristics under various relative humidity conditions (11-93%).
data.target_sentence: This study investigated the effects of seaweed on microbial stability and quality characteristics under various relative humidity conditions (11-93%).

data.source_sentence: 미생물 안정성을 확인하기 위해 저장 중대장균군, 일반세균, 효모 및 곰팡이수를 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to confirm microbial stability, the storage medium enterococcal group, general bacteria, yeast, and fungal water were analyzed.
data.target_sentence: In order to confirm microbial stability, the number of enterococcal group, general bacteria, yeast, and fungi in the storage medium were analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 식품의 저장기간을 연장하는 중요한 방법으로는 수분함량 저하, 수분활성도 조절, 산소 공급의 차단, 온도, 습도 및 기체조성을 조절하여 생리기능을 억제하는 등의 여러 방안이 있을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Important ways to extend the storage period of food may include reducing moisture content, controlling moisture activity, blocking oxygen supply, controlling temperature, humidity, and gas composition to suppress physiological functions.
data.target_sentence: Important ways to extend the storage period of food may include reducing moisture content, controlling moisture activity, blocking oxygen supply, controlling temperature, humidity, and gas composition to suppress physiological functions.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 상대습도에 따른 저장 기간별 미생물학적 및 이화학적 특성 변화를 분석하여 해조류의 저장 시 적합한 상대습도를 규명하고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, we tried to identify the suitable relative humidity for the storage of seaweeds by analyzing the changes in microbiological and physicochemical properties for each storage period according to the relative humidity.
data.target_sentence: In this study, we tried to identify the suitable relative humidity for the storage of seaweeds by analyzing the changes in microbiological and physicochemical properties for each storage period according to the relative humidity.

data.source_sentence: 제품을 구매하여 3회 수세한 뒤 탈수 및 동결하여 동결건조를 진행하여 샘플을 -80℃에 저장하여 실험을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After purchasing the product, washing with water 3 times, dehydrating and freezing, freeze-drying, and storing the sample at -80 ° C.
data.target_sentence: After purchasing the product, washing with water 3 times, dehydrating and freezing, freeze-drying, and storing the sample at -80 ° C, the experiment was conducted.

data.source_sentence: 상대습도 11~96%의 조건의 챔버를 제조하기 위하여 각각의 염을 포화용액 이상의 농도로 용해하여 포화상태로 만든 용액(650 mL)을 데시게이터(1.5 L) 안에 넣어 상대습도를 조절하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to prepare a chamber having a relative humidity of 11 to 96%, a solution 650 mL prepared in a saturated state by dissolving each salt at a concentration of a saturated solution or more was added into a desiccator 1.5 L to adjust the relative humidity.
data.target_sentence: In order to prepare a chamber having a relative humidity of 11 to 96%, a solution 650 mL prepared in a saturated state by dissolving each salt at a concentration of a saturated solution or more was added into a desiccator 1.5 L to adjust the relative humidity.

data.source_sentence: 상대습도가 맞춰진 데시게이터 안에 멸균된 칭량접시안에 시료 10 g을 배분한 뒤 상온에서 2, 4, 6, 8주간 저장하여 실험에 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After distributing 10 g of the sample to a sterilized weighing dish in a desiccator set with relative humidity, it was stored at room temperature for 2, 4, 6, and 8 weeks and used for the experiment.
data.target_sentence: After distributing 10 g of the sample to a sterilized weighing dish in a desiccator set with relative humidity, it was stored at room temperature for 2, 4, 6, and 8 weeks and used for the experiment.

data.source_sentence: 여러 상대습도에서 저장한 해초의 등온흡습곡선은 매일 무게를 측정함으로써 수분 이동에 의한 시료 무게의 증감을 조사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The isothermal absorption curve of seaweed stored at various relative humidity measured the weight of the sample every day to investigate the increase or decrease of the weight of the sample due to moisture movement.
data.target_sentence: The isothermal absorption curve of seaweed stored at various relative humidity measured the weight of the sample every day to investigate the increase or decrease of the weight of the sample due to moisture movement.

data.source_sentence: 해초분말의 미생물 안정성을 알아보기 위해서 일반세균, 대장균군, 효모 및 곰팡이 수를 3회 반복하여 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to find out the microbial stability of seaweed powder, the number of general bacteria, E. coli groups, yeast, and fungi was repeatedly measured three times.
data.target_sentence: In order to find out the microbial stability of seaweed powder, the number of general bacteria, E. coli groups, yeast, and fungi was repeatedly measured three times.

data.source_sentence: 여과액 20 μL와 ABTS 용액 980 μL를 혼합 후 실온의 암실에서 6분 동안 정치한 다음 분광광도계를 이용하여 734 nm에서 흡광도를 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: 20 μL of the filtrate and 980 μL of the ABTS solution were mixed, left in a dark room at room temperature for 6 minutes, and then absorbance was measured at 734 nm using a spectrophotometer.
data.target_sentence: 20 μL of the filtrate and 980 μL of the ABTS solution were mixed, left in a dark room at room temperature for 6 minutes, and then absorbance was measured at 734 nm using a spectrophotometer.

data.source_sentence: 여러 상대습도 조건에서 저장 기간에 따른 해초분말의 등온흡습곡선은 Fig. 1과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The isothermal absorption curve of seaweed powder according to the storage period under various relative humidity conditions is shown in Figure 1.
data.target_sentence: The isothermal absorption curve of seaweed powder according to the storage period under various relative humidity conditions is shown in Figure 1.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 등온흡습곡선은 식품의 흡습성을 관찰할 때 필요한 것이고 등온탈습곡선은 건조과정을 연구하는 데 유용한 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, an isothermal hygroscopicity curve is necessary when observing the hygroscopicity of food, and an isothermal dehumidification curve is useful for studying the drying process.
data.target_sentence: In general, an isothermal absorption curve is necessary when observing the absorption of food, and an isothermal dehumidification curve is useful for studying the drying process.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 해초분말을 25±2℃에 각각의 상대습도 조건에 저장하였을 때 2주 후 평형수분함량에 도달하였으며 전형적인 등온흡습곡선인 S-curve (Sigmoid curve) 형태를 보이는 것을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, when the seaweed powder was stored at 25±2℃ in each relative humidity condition, the equilibrium moisture content was reached after 2 weeks, and it was confirmed that the S-curve (Sigmoid curve) shape, a typical isothermal moisture absorption curve, was observed.
data.target_sentence: In this study, when the seaweed powder was stored at 25±2℃ in each relative humidity condition, the equilibrium moisture content was reached after 2 weeks, and it was confirmed that the S-curve (Sigmoid curve) shape, a typical isothermal moisture absorption curve, was observed.

data.source_sentence: 등온흡습곡선은 상대습도 11~69% 조건에서 완만하게 증가하였다가 69~93%까지 급격하게 증가하는 경향을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: The isothermal moisture absorption curve showed a tendency to increase gently in the 11~69% relative humidity condition and then rapidly increase to 69~93%.
data.target_sentence: The isothermal absorption curve showed a tendency to increase gently in the 11~69% relative humidity condition and then rapidly increase to 69~93%.

data.source_sentence: 제1형 영역은 매우 낮은 수분 함량을 가진 영역이기 때문에 제2형 영역에 해당하는 수분함량을 가진 식품보다 안정성이나 저장성이 높은 것으로 알려져 있다.

data.source_sentence: 저장 기간별 상대습도에 따른 해조류 분말의 고결현상 분석은 Table 1과 같다.

data.target_sentence: Cyclones and impactors among bio-aerosol collectors can also use filters as collection surfaces.

data.source_sentence: 채취기의 유량이 클수록 분리입경은 작아지고 채취할 수 있는 입자가 많다.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 세균은 1 µm 정도이지만 세균 덩어리(bacterial aggregates)를 이루거나 큰 입자에 붙어 있기 때문에 포집하기에 용이하고 곰팡이 입자는 보통 2-5 µm이므로 포집 효율이 더 높은 편이다.

data.target_sentence: In general, bacteria are about 1μm, but they are easy to collect because they form bacterial aggregates or adhere to large particles, and fungi particles are usually 2-5μm, so collection efficiency is higher.

data.target_sentence: Recently, as AM cluster differences according to atmospheric physicochemical factors and PM particle size have been analyzed a lot, PM 2.5 was often collected and used in fiber filters using high-volume air samplers.

data.source_sentence: 미생물 군집 분석에서 중요한 첫 번째 단계는 DNA 추출로 서로 다른 환경에서 다르게 나타나는 군집을 비교하기 위해서는 높은 수준의 DNA 추출이 관건이다.
data.mt_sentence: An important first step in microbial community analysis is DNA extraction, which is the key to high-level DNA extraction to compare clusters that appear differently in different environments.
data.target_sentence: An important first step in microbial community analysis is DNA extraction, which is the key to high-level DNA extraction to compare clusters that appear differently in different environments.

data.source_sentence: 특히 공기 시료와 같이 채취 시료에 따라 다량의 미생물이 서식 중이라는 보장이 어려운 경우에는 NGS(Next-Generation Sequencing) 분석에 적합할 정도의 질과 고농도로 추출된 DNA를 얻는 것이 쉽지 않다.

data.source_sentence: 기온과 강수량 등은 PM의 미생물 다양성에 영향을 미칠수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Temperature and precipitation can affect the microbial diversity of PM.
data.target_sentence: Temperature and precipitation can affect the microbial diversity of PM.

data.source_sentence: PM의 미생물 메타게놈 다양성에 미치는 계절 영향에 대한 연구 결과는 시료 채취 지역과 대기오염 정도에 따라 차이가 있지만 전체적인 경향을 도출하기 위해 기존 연구결과를 종합적으로 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Although the results of the study on the seasonal effect of PM on the microbial metagenome diversity differ depending on the sampling area and the degree of air pollution, the existing research results were comprehensively analyzed to derive the overall trend.
data.target_sentence: Although the results of the study on the seasonal effect of PM on the microbial metagenome diversity differ depending on the sampling area and the degree of air pollution, the existing research results were comprehensively analyzed to derive the overall trend.

data.source_sentence: 종 다양성 지표인 Shannon 지표는 겨울, 가을, 여름, 봄 순으로 겨울이 가장 높고 봄이 가장 낮았다.
data.mt_sentence: The Shannon index, an indicator of species diversity, showed the highest winter and lowest spring in the order of winter, fall, summer, and spring.
data.target_sentence: The Shannon index, an indicator of species diversity, showed the highest winter and lowest spring in the order of winter, fall, summer, and spring.

data.source_sentence: PM의 곰팡이 메타게놈의 다양성에 미치는 계절적 영향은 세균 다양성에 미치는 영향과 매우 유사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The seasonal effect of PM on the diversity of the fungal metagenome was very similar to that of bacterial diversity.
data.target_sentence: The seasonal effect of PM on the diversity of the fungal metagenome was very similar to that of bacterial diversity.

data.source_sentence: 종풍부도 지표인 Chao 1와 ACE 지표는 겨울철이 가장 높고 여름에 가장 낮았다.
data.mt_sentence: The wind gust index, Chao 1, and ACE indicators, were the highest in winter and the lowest in summer.
data.target_sentence: The species richness index, Chao 1, and ACE indicators, were the highest in winter and the lowest in summer.

data.source_sentence: Shannon 지표는 겨울철에 가장 높았고 봄철에 가장 낮은 경향이 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: The Shannon index tends to be highest in winter and lowest in spring.
data.target_sentence: The Shannon index tends to be highest in winter and lowest in spring.

data.source_sentence: 여름철에는 강우가 빈번하게 내리고 고온과 강한 자외선(UV) 복사로 인해 AM에 대한 살균 효과가 종 다양성에 영향을 미쳤을 것으로 추측된다.
data.mt_sentence: Due to frequent rainfall in summer and high temperature and strong ultraviolet (UV) radiation, it is speculated that the bactericidal effect on AM may have affected the species diversity.
data.target_sentence: Due to frequent rainfall in summer and high temperature and strong ultraviolet (UV) radiation, it is speculated that the bactericidal effect on AM may have affected the species diversity.

data.source_sentence: PM 메타게놈의 다양성은 대기오염도에 따라 달라지며 기온과 강수량 등은 PM의 미생물 다양성에 영향을 미칠 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The diversity of PM metagenomes varies depending on the degree of air pollution, and temperature and precipitation can affect the microbial diversity of PM.
data.target_sentence: The diversity of PM metagenomes varies depending on the degree of air pollution, and temperature and precipitation can affect the microbial diversity of PM.

data.source_sentence: AAA도 중국 북경에서 채취한 시료를 대상으로 PM의 세균과 곰팡이 다양성에 미치는 대기질 영향을 평가한 결과 미생물 다양성은 대기질이 저하함에 따라 감소했다가 다시 증가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA also evaluated the air quality effect of PM on bacterial and fungal diversity in samples collected from Beijing, China. As a result, microbial diversity decreased and then increased again as air quality deteriorated.
data.target_sentence: AAA also evaluated the air quality effect of PM on bacterial and fungal diversity in samples collected from Beijing, China; then as a result, microbial diversity decreased and then increased again as air quality deteriorated.

data.source_sentence: 미국의 콜로라도에서 계절별로 에어로졸 시료를 채취하여 세균의 메타게놈을 분석한 결과 Proteobacteria의 비율은 봄(64.4%)과 여름(60.3%)에 비해 가을(44.1%)과 겨울철(59.7%)에 약간 낮아졌다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of analyzing the metagenome of bacteria by collecting seasonal aerosol samples in Colorado, the proportion of Proteobacteria was slightly lower in autumn (44.1%) and winter (59.7%) compared to spring (64.4%) and summer (60.3%).
data.target_sentence: As a result of analyzing the metagenome of bacteria by collecting seasonal aerosol samples in Colorado, the proportion of Proteobacteria was slightly lower in autumn (44.1%) and winter (59.7%) compared to spring (64.4%) and summer (60.3%).

data.source_sentence: 세균의 메타게놈에 미치는 계절적 영향을 파악하기 위해 Table 8에 정리한 결과를 계절별로 정리하여 Fig. 8에 도시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to understand the seasonal effect of bacteria on the metagenome, the results summarized in Table 8 are summarized by season and shown in Figure 8.
data.target_sentence: In order to understand the seasonal effect of bacteria on the metagenome, the results summarized in Table 8 are summarized by season and shown in Figure 8.

data.source_sentence: 이와 반대로 Firmicutes의 비율은 여름(6.9%)에 비해 봄과 가을에는 각각 15.0%와 19.7% 그리고 겨울에는 21.1%로 기온이 낮아짐에 따라 높아지는 경향이 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In contrast, the proportion of Firmicutes tended to increase as temperatures decreased to 15.0% and 19.7% in spring and fall, and 21.1% in winter, respectively, compared to summer (6.9%).
data.target_sentence: In contrast, the proportion of Firmicutes tended to increase as temperatures decreased to 15.0% and 19.7% in spring and fall, and 21.1% in winter, respectively, compared to summer (6.9%).

data.source_sentence: 오염이 심한 날에 채취한 PM2.5 시료의 Firmicutes의 비율은 고도가 높아질수록 감소하는 경향이 있었다.

data.target_sentence: The proportion of Firmicutes in PM2.5 samples collected on highly polluted days tended to decrease with increasing altitude.

data.source_sentence: 각 고도에서의 우점종은 대기질이 좋은 날과 나쁜 날에 상관없이 동일하였다.

data.target_sentence: The dominant species at each altitude were the same regardless of whether the air quality was good or bad.

data.source_sentence: Bacillus는 가혹한 환경에 적응하기 위해 내생포자를 생성할 수 있으며 대기 먼지와 토양에서 널리 발견되는 휴면 상태로 장기간 생존 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: Bacillus can produce endogenous spores to adapt to harsh environments and can survive for long periods of time in dormant conditions widely found in atmospheric dust and soil.
data.target_sentence: Bacillus can produce endogenous spores to adapt to harsh environments and can survive for long periods of time in dormant conditions widely found in atmospheric dust and soil.

data.source_sentence: Lactococcus는 일반적으로 토양에 서식하며 이는 대기 세균의 주요 공급원이었다.
data.mt_sentence: Lactococcus usually inhabits soil and was a major source of atmospheric bacteria.
data.target_sentence: Lactococcus usually inhabits soil and was a major source of atmospheric bacteria.

data.source_sentence: Pseudomonas는 병원성을 지닌 종도 있지만 이 세균은 토양 생태계의 영양 순환에서 중요한 역할을 한다.

data.target_sentence: In some regions, there was a significant negative or statistically insignificant correlation between the diversity of bacteria and fungi in the bioaerosol and the temperature.

data.target_sentence: Ozone is another important factor influencing the species richness and diversity of fungi.

data.target_sentence: The effect of toxic chemical components of PM in the air on fungi diversity in the air should be identified in future studies.
